namespace = MEC_Expeditions
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.002
	title = MEC_Expeditions.002.name
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.002.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	trigger = { 
		total_development = 30
		has_institution = Legalism
		NOT = { 
			has_idea = exploration_ideas_2
		}
		NOT = { 
			has_idea = expansion_ideas_1
		}
		OR = { 
			AND = { 
				is_colonial_nation = yes
				any_owned_province = { 
					has_empty_adjacent_province = yes
				}
			}
			any_owned_province = { 
				any_empty_neighbor_province = { 
					NOT = { 
						has_province_flag = ColonyBecomesOwner
						has_province_flag = NoRandomSpread
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	mean_time_to_happen = { 
		years = 100
	}
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			random_owned_province = { 
				limit = { 
					has_empty_adjacent_province = yes
					OR = { 
						ROOT = { 
							is_colonial_nation = yes
						}
						any_empty_neighbor_province = { 
							NOT = { 
								has_province_flag = ColonyBecomesOwner
								has_province_flag = NoRandomSpread
							}
						}
					}
				}
				random_empty_neighbor_province = { 
					limit = { 
						OR = { 
							ROOT = { 
								is_colonial_nation = yes
							}
							NOT = { 
								has_province_flag = ColonyBecomesOwner
								has_province_flag = NoRandomSpread
							}
						}
					}
					save_event_target_as = neighbor_province
					discover_country = ROOT
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							ROOT = { 
								is_colonial_nation = yes
							}
						}
						change_religion = ROOT
						change_culture = ROOT
					}
					add_territorial_core = ROOT
					cede_province = ROOT
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.002.opt
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.003
	title = MEC_Expeditions.003.name
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.003.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	trigger = { 
		OR = { 
			has_idea = exploration_ideas_3
			has_country_modifier = can_colonize_country_modifier
		}
		max_sailors = 1500
		NOT = { 
			has_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_paused
		}
		num_of_ports = 1
		OR = { 
			AND = { 
				expedition_provs.british_isles = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = {

						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = {

					}
				}

							which = kjc

		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 100
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.1
				num_of_provinces_owned_or_owned_by_non_sovereign_subjects_with = { 
					province_group = expedition_provs.northwest_africa
					OR = { 
						has_province_modifier = trading_post_province
						has_province_flag = TN_Natural
					}

				}

				factor = 0
				NOT = { 
					is_year = 1650
				}
				NOT = { 
					num_of_provinces_owned_or_owned_by_non_sovereign_subjects_with = { 
						value = 1
						province_group = tradenode_comb_52
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.1
				has_country_modifier = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_northwest_africa
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.05
				expedition_provs.northwest_africa = { 
					type = all
					is_empty = no
					owner = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = kjc
							which = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

				name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_northwest_africa
				duration = 282
			}
			set_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_northwest_africa
		}

		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1200
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.1
				num_of_provinces_owned_or_owned_by_non_sovereign_subjects_with = { 
					province_group = expedition_provs.western_india
					OR = { 
						has_province_modifier = trading_post_province
						has_province_flag = TN_Natural
					}
					value = 1
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0
				NOT = { 
					is_year = 1650
				}
				NOT = { 
					num_of_provinces_owned_or_owned_by_non_sovereign_subjects_with = { 
						value = 1
						province_group = tradenode_comb_35
					}
				}
				NOT = { 
					num_of_provinces_owned_or_owned_by_non_sovereign_subjects_with = { 
						value = 1
						province_group = tradenode_comb_36
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.1
				has_country_modifier = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_western_india
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.05
				expedition_provs.western_india = { 
					type = all
					is_empty = no
					owner = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = kjc
							which = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_western_india
				duration = 282
			}
			set_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_western_india
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_idea = colonialism_ideas_1
			}
			random_list = { 
				80 = { 
					country_event = {

						days = 282

				num_of_provinces_owned_or_owned_by_non_sovereign_subjects_with = { 
					province_group = expedition_provs.japan
					OR = { 
						has_province_modifier = trading_post_province
						has_province_flag = TN_Natural
					}
					value = 1
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0
				NOT = { 
					is_year = 1650
				}
				NOT = { 
					num_of_provinces_owned_or_owned_by_non_sovereign_subjects_with = { 
						value = 1
						province_group = tradenode_comb_7
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.1
				has_country_modifier = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_japan
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.05
				expedition_provs.japan = { 
					type = all
					is_empty = no
					owner = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = kjc
							which = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_japan
				duration = 282
			}
			set_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_japan
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_idea = colonialism_ideas_1
			}
			random_list = { 
				80 = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = MEC_Expeditions.126
						days = 282
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = MEC_Expeditions.626
						days = 282
					}
				}
				5 = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = MEC_Expeditions.526
						days = 282
					}
				}
				5 = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = MEC_Expeditions.426
						days = 282
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			random_list = { 
				40 = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = MEC_Expeditions.126
						days = 282
					}
				}
				15 = {

						days = 282

		name = MEC_Expeditions.003.cuba_repeat
		trigger = { 
			AND = { 
				expedition_provs.cuba = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = {

								province_group = tradenode_46
								province_group = tradenode_44
								province_group = tradenode_15
							}
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						dip_tech = 18
						capital_scope = { 
							OR = { 
								province_group = tradenode_14
							}
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						dip_tech = 17
						capital_scope = { 
							OR = { 
								province_group = tradenode_16
								province_group = tradenode_64
							}
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						dip_tech = 16
						capital_scope = { 
							OR = { 
								province_group = tradenode_43
							}
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						dip_tech = 15
						capital_scope = { 
							OR = { 
								province_group = tradenode_42
								province_group = tradenode_9
								province_group = tradenode_62
								province_group = tradenode_63
								province_group = tradenode_61
								province_group = tradenode_66
							}
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						dip_tech = 13
						capital_scope = { 
							OR = { 
								province_group = tradenode_65
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			has_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_caribbean
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 800
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.1
				num_of_provinces_owned_or_owned_by_non_sovereign_subjects_with = { 
					province_group = expedition_provs.caribbean
					OR = { 
						has_province_modifier = trading_post_province
						has_province_flag = TN_Natural
					}
					value = 1
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0
				NOT = { 
					is_year = 1650
				}
				NOT = { 
					num_of_provinces_owned_or_owned_by_non_sovereign_subjects_with = { 
						value = 1
						province_group = tradenode_comb_65
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.1
				has_country_modifier = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_caribbean
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.05
				expedition_provs.caribbean = { 
					type = all
					is_empty = no
					owner = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = kjc
							which = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_caribbean
				duration = 282
			}
			set_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_caribbean
		}

			limit = { 
				has_idea = colonialism_ideas_1
			}
			random_list = { 
				80 = {

						days = 282
					}

		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1600
			modifier = { 
				factor = 5
				num_of_provinces_owned_or_owned_by_non_sovereign_subjects_with = { 
					value = 1
					province_group = expedition_provs.atlantic_mexico
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0
				NOT = { 
					is_year = 1650
				}
				NOT = { 
					num_of_provinces_owned_or_owned_by_non_sovereign_subjects_with = { 
						value = 1
						province_group = tradenode_comb_42
					}
				}
				NOT = { 
					num_of_provinces_owned_or_owned_by_non_sovereign_subjects_with = { 
						value = 1
						province_group = tradenode_comb_9
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.1
				has_country_modifier = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_atlantic_mexico
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.05
				expedition_provs.atlantic_mexico = { 
					type = all
					is_empty = no
					owner = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = kjc
							which = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_atlantic_mexico
				duration = 282
			}
			set_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_atlantic_mexico
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_idea = colonialism_ideas_1
			}
			random_list = { 
				80 = { 
					country_event = {

						days = 282
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = MEC_Expeditions.632
						days = 282
					}

						days = 282
					}
				}

						id = MEC_Expeditions.432

					}
				}
			}

		name = MEC_Expeditions.003.gulf_of_mexico_repeat
		trigger = { 
			AND = { 
				expedition_provs.gulf_of_mexico = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				OR = { 
					AND = { 
						dip_tech = 33
						capital_scope = { 
							OR = { 
								province_group = tradenode_1
							}
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						dip_tech = 25
						capital_scope = { 
							OR = { 
								province_group = tradenode_70
								province_group = tradenode_67
								province_group = tradenode_80
								province_group = tradenode_73
								province_group = tradenode_74
								province_group = tradenode_77
								province_group = tradenode_81
								province_group = tradenode_54
								province_group = tradenode_79
								province_group = tradenode_72
								province_group = tradenode_55
								province_group = tradenode_71
								province_group = tradenode_76
								province_group = tradenode_53
								province_group = tradenode_69
								province_group = tradenode_68
								province_group = tradenode_78
								province_group = tradenode_75
								province_group = tradenode_60
								province_group = tradenode_57
								province_group = tradenode_49
								province_group = tradenode_56
								province_group = tradenode_52
								province_group = tradenode_59
								province_group = tradenode_58
								province_group = tradenode_48
								province_group = tradenode_47
								province_group = tradenode_45
								province_group = tradenode_46
								province_group = tradenode_44
								province_group = tradenode_41
								province_group = tradenode_39
								province_group = tradenode_40
								province_group = tradenode_38
								province_group = tradenode_37
								province_group = tradenode_51
								province_group = tradenode_50
								province_group = tradenode_30
								province_group = tradenode_29
								province_group = tradenode_27
								province_group = tradenode_28
								province_group = tradenode_36
								province_group = tradenode_35
								province_group = tradenode_32
								province_group = tradenode_34
								province_group = tradenode_33
								province_group = tradenode_26
								province_group = tradenode_25
								province_group = tradenode_31
								province_group = tradenode_21
								province_group = tradenode_20
								province_group = tradenode_24
								province_group = tradenode_23
								province_group = tradenode_18
								province_group = tradenode_22
								province_group = tradenode_19
								province_group = tradenode_2
								province_group = tradenode_17
								province_group = tradenode_12
								province_group = tradenode_10
								province_group = tradenode_3
								province_group = tradenode_6
								province_group = tradenode_13
								province_group = tradenode_11
								province_group = tradenode_5
								province_group = tradenode_7
								province_group = tradenode_4
							}
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						dip_tech = 20
						capital_scope = { 
							OR = { 
								province_group = tradenode_8
							}
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						dip_tech = 19
						capital_scope = { 
							OR = { 
								province_group = tradenode_15
								province_group = tradenode_14
							}
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						dip_tech = 17
						capital_scope = { 
							OR = { 
								province_group = tradenode_16
								province_group = tradenode_64
							}
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						dip_tech = 16
						capital_scope = { 
							OR = { 
								province_group = tradenode_43
							}
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						dip_tech = 15
						capital_scope = { 
							OR = { 
								province_group = tradenode_42
								province_group = tradenode_65
								province_group = tradenode_9
								province_group = tradenode_66
							}
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						dip_tech = 13
						capital_scope = { 
							OR = { 
								province_group = tradenode_62
								province_group = tradenode_63
								province_group = tradenode_61
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			has_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_gulf_of_mexico
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 200
			modifier = { 
				factor = 5
				num_of_provinces_owned_or_owned_by_non_sovereign_subjects_with = { 
					value = 1
					province_group = expedition_provs.gulf_of_mexico
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0
				NOT = { 
					is_year = 1650
				}
				NOT = { 
					num_of_provinces_owned_or_owned_by_non_sovereign_subjects_with = { 
						value = 1
						province_group = tradenode_comb_62
					}
				}
				NOT = { 
					num_of_provinces_owned_or_owned_by_non_sovereign_subjects_with = { 
						value = 1
						province_group = tradenode_comb_63
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.1
				has_country_modifier = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_gulf_of_mexico
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.05
				expedition_provs.gulf_of_mexico = { 
					type = all
					is_empty = no
					owner = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = kjc
							which = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_gulf_of_mexico
				duration = 282
			}
			set_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_gulf_of_mexico
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_idea = colonialism_ideas_1
			}
			random_list = { 
				80 = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = MEC_Expeditions.135
						days = 282
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = MEC_Expeditions.635
						days = 282
					}
				}
				5 = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = MEC_Expeditions.535
						days = 282
					}
				}
				5 = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = MEC_Expeditions.435
						days = 282
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			random_list = { 
				40 = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = MEC_Expeditions.135
						days = 282
					}
				}
				15 = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = MEC_Expeditions.635
						days = 282
					}
				}
				15 = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = MEC_Expeditions.535
						days = 282
					}
				}
				30 = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = MEC_Expeditions.435
						days = 282
					}
				}
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.gulf_of_mexico = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}
	}

			factor = 100
			modifier = { 
				factor = 5
				num_of_provinces_owned_or_owned_by_non_sovereign_subjects_with = { 
					value = 1
					province_group = expedition_provs.la_plata
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0
				NOT = { 
					is_year = 1650
				}
				NOT = { 
					num_of_provinces_owned_or_owned_by_non_sovereign_subjects_with = { 
						value = 1

					}
				}
			}

				factor = 0.1

				factor = 0.05
				expedition_provs.la_plata = { 
					type = all
					is_empty = no
					owner = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = kjc
							which = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

			}

		}

				expedition_provs.alaska = { 
					type = all
					is_empty = no
					owner = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = kjc
							which = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_alaska
				duration = 282
			}
			set_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_alaska
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_idea = colonialism_ideas_1
			}
			random_list = { 
				80 = { 
					country_event = {

		name = MEC_Expeditions.003.pacific_mexico_repeat
		trigger = { 
			AND = { 
				expedition_provs.pacific_mexico = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}

				}
			}

								province_group = tradenode_58
								province_group = tradenode_48
								province_group = tradenode_47
								province_group = tradenode_45
								province_group = tradenode_46
								province_group = tradenode_44
								province_group = tradenode_41
								province_group = tradenode_39
								province_group = tradenode_40
								province_group = tradenode_38
								province_group = tradenode_37
								province_group = tradenode_51
								province_group = tradenode_50
								province_group = tradenode_30
								province_group = tradenode_29
								province_group = tradenode_27
								province_group = tradenode_28
								province_group = tradenode_36
								province_group = tradenode_35
								province_group = tradenode_32
								province_group = tradenode_34
								province_group = tradenode_33
								province_group = tradenode_26
								province_group = tradenode_25
								province_group = tradenode_31
								province_group = tradenode_21
								province_group = tradenode_20
								province_group = tradenode_24
								province_group = tradenode_23
								province_group = tradenode_18
								province_group = tradenode_22
								province_group = tradenode_19
								province_group = tradenode_2
								province_group = tradenode_17
								province_group = tradenode_12
								province_group = tradenode_10
								province_group = tradenode_3
								province_group = tradenode_6
								province_group = tradenode_13
								province_group = tradenode_11
								province_group = tradenode_5
								province_group = tradenode_7
								province_group = tradenode_4
							}
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						dip_tech = 20
						capital_scope = { 
							OR = { 
								province_group = tradenode_64
							}
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						dip_tech = 19
						capital_scope = { 
							OR = { 
								province_group = tradenode_65
								province_group = tradenode_63
								province_group = tradenode_61
								province_group = tradenode_66
							}
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						dip_tech = 17
						capital_scope = { 
							OR = { 
								province_group = tradenode_43
								province_group = tradenode_62
								province_group = tradenode_8
							}
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						dip_tech = 16
						capital_scope = { 
							OR = { 
								province_group = tradenode_16
								province_group = tradenode_42
								province_group = tradenode_9
							}
						}
					}
					AND = { 
						dip_tech = 13
						capital_scope = { 
							OR = { 
								province_group = tradenode_15
								province_group = tradenode_14
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			NOT = { 
				has_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_chile
			}
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 400
			modifier = { 
				factor = 5
				num_of_provinces_owned_or_owned_by_non_sovereign_subjects_with = { 
					value = 1
					province_group = expedition_provs.chile
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0
				NOT = { 
					is_year = 1650
				}
				NOT = { 
					num_of_provinces_owned_or_owned_by_non_sovereign_subjects_with = { 
						value = 1
						province_group = tradenode_comb_15
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.02
				calc_true_if = { 
					all_province = { 
						province_group = expedition_provs.chile
						NOT = { 
							country_or_non_sovereign_subject_holds = ROOT
						}
						owner = { 
							OR = { 
								is_colonial_nation = yes
								is_former_colonial_nation = yes
								has_idea = exploration_ideas_1
							}
						}
					}
					amount = 2
				}
				NOT = { 
					num_of_provinces_owned_or_owned_by_non_sovereign_subjects_with = { 
						value = 2
						province_group = expedition_provs.chile
					}
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.1
				has_country_modifier = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_chile
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 0.05
				expedition_provs.chile = { 
					type = all
					is_empty = no
					owner = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = kjc
							which = ROOT
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		hidden_effect = { 
			add_country_modifier = { 
				name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_chile
				duration = 282
			}
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_british_isles
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_northern_europe
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_france
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_iberia
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_iberian_islands
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_northwest_africa
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_west_africa
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_gulf_of_guinea
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_central_africa
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_south_africa
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_east_africa
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_indian_ocean
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_arabia
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_western_india
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_southern_india
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_eastern_india
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_malacca
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_southeast_asia
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_indonesia
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_philippines
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_papua
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_australia
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_pacific_islands
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_southern_china
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_northern_china
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_korea
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_japan
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_cuba
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_hispaniola
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_caribbean
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_atlantic_colombia
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_guyana
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_atlantic_mexico
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_north_brazil
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_south_brazil
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_gulf_of_mexico
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_southeastern_america
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_eastern_america
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_canada
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_north_atlantic
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_hudson_bay
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_la_plata
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_california
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_alaska
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_pacific_mexico
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_pacific_central_america
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_peru
			clr_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_chile
			set_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_sent_chile
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				has_idea = colonialism_ideas_1
			}
			random_list = { 
				80 = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = MEC_Expeditions.147
						days = 282
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = MEC_Expeditions.647
						days = 282
					}
				}
				5 = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = MEC_Expeditions.547
						days = 282
					}
				}
				5 = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = MEC_Expeditions.447
						days = 282
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			random_list = { 
				40 = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = MEC_Expeditions.147
						days = 282
					}
				}
				15 = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = MEC_Expeditions.647
						days = 282
					}
				}
				15 = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = MEC_Expeditions.547
						days = 282
					}
				}
				30 = { 
					country_event = { 
						id = MEC_Expeditions.447
						days = 282
					}
				}
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.chile = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}
	}
	after = { 
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				NOT = { 
					has_idea = colonialism_ideas_1
				}
			}
			set_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_skip_year
		}
		ROOT = { 
			change_variable = { 
				which = kjc
				value = 5
			}
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.100
	title = MEC_Expeditions.100.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.100.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.british_isles = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}
			while = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				random_province = { 
					limit = { 
						province_group = expedition_provs.british_isles
						AND = { 
							NOT = { 
								country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -2
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 4
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.200
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.400
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.british_isles = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.101
	title = MEC_Expeditions.101.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.101.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.northern_europe = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}
			while = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				random_province = { 
					limit = { 
						province_group = expedition_provs.northern_europe
						AND = { 
							NOT = { 
								country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -2
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 4
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.201
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.401
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.northern_europe = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.102
	title = MEC_Expeditions.102.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.102.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.france = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}
			while = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				random_province = { 
					limit = { 
						province_group = expedition_provs.france
						AND = { 
							NOT = { 
								country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -2
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 4
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.202
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.402
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.france = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.103
	title = MEC_Expeditions.103.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.103.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.iberia = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}
			while = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				random_province = { 
					limit = { 
						province_group = expedition_provs.iberia
						AND = { 
							NOT = {

							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -2
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari

							}

						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 4
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.203
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.403
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.iberia = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.104
	title = MEC_Expeditions.104.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.104.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.iberian_islands = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}
			while = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				random_province = { 
					limit = { 
						province_group = expedition_provs.iberian_islands
						AND = { 
							NOT = { 
								country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -2
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 4
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.204
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.404
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.iberian_islands = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.105
	title = MEC_Expeditions.105.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.105.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.northwest_africa = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}
			while = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				random_province = { 
					limit = { 
						province_group = expedition_provs.northwest_africa
						AND = { 
							NOT = { 
								country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -2
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 4
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.205
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.405
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.northwest_africa = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.106
	title = MEC_Expeditions.106.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.106.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.west_africa = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}
			while = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}

						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = {

						which = arm
						value = 1

						province_group = expedition_provs.west_africa

									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}

							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -2
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh

							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry

						if = {

									which = ari
