							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 4
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.217
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.417
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.southeast_asia = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.118
	title = MEC_Expeditions.118.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.118.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.indonesia = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}
			while = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				random_province = { 
					limit = { 
						province_group = expedition_provs.indonesia
						AND = { 
							NOT = { 
								country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -2
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 4
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.218
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.418
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.indonesia = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.119
	title = MEC_Expeditions.119.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.119.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.philippines = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}

				which = arm
				value = 20
			}

				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}

						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}

								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}

						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}

						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = {

						which = arm

										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}

							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = {

							}

							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}

							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf

							}

							change_variable = {

								value = -3

							change_variable = {

							}

							change_variable = {

								value = -1

							which = aro

						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = {

							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = {

							}

							which = brw
						}

							which = ari
							which = bry

									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = {

									which = ari
									value = 4
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.219
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.419
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.philippines = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}

country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.120
	title = MEC_Expeditions.120.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.120.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.papua = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}
			while = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}

						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				random_province = { 
					limit = { 
						province_group = expedition_provs.papua
						AND = { 
							NOT = { 
								country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -2
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 4
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.220
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.420
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.papua = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.121
	title = MEC_Expeditions.121.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.121.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.australia = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}
			while = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				random_province = { 
					limit = { 
						province_group = expedition_provs.australia
						AND = { 
							NOT = { 
								country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -2
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 4
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.221
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.421
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.australia = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.122
	title = MEC_Expeditions.122.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.122.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.pacific_islands = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}
			while = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				random_province = { 
					limit = { 
						province_group = expedition_provs.pacific_islands
						AND = { 
							NOT = { 
								country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -2
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0

							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry

						if = { 
							limit = {

									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari

									which = ari

								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.222
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.422
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.pacific_islands = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.123
	title = MEC_Expeditions.123.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.123.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.southern_china = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}
			while = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				random_province = { 
					limit = { 
						province_group = expedition_provs.southern_china
						AND = { 
							NOT = { 
								country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -2
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 4
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.223
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.423
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.southern_china = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.124
	title = MEC_Expeditions.124.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.124.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.northern_china = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}

				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}

						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}

					limit = {

						AND = {

									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = {

									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}

							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}

							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}

							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = {

							}

							change_variable = {

							change_variable = {

							}

							which = aro
							which = arf

							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = {

							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner

							which = arf
							which = export
						}

							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}

							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry

									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = {

									which = ari
									value = 4
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.224
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.424
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.northern_china = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects

country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.125
	title = MEC_Expeditions.125.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.125.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.korea = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}
			while = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}

						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				random_province = { 
					limit = { 
						province_group = expedition_provs.korea
						AND = { 
							NOT = { 
								country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -2
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 4
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.225
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.425
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.korea = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.126
	title = MEC_Expeditions.126.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.126.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.japan = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}
			while = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				random_province = { 
					limit = { 
						province_group = expedition_provs.japan
						AND = { 
							NOT = { 
								country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -2
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 4
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.226
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.426
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.japan = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.127
	title = MEC_Expeditions.127.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.127.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.cuba = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}
			while = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}

						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				random_province = { 
					limit = { 
						province_group = expedition_provs.cuba
						AND = { 
							NOT = { 
								country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -2
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 4
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.227
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.427
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.cuba = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}
	}

country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.128
	title = MEC_Expeditions.128.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.128.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.hispaniola = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}
			while = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}
