						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				random_province = { 
					limit = { 
						province_group = expedition_provs.hispaniola
						AND = { 
							NOT = { 
								country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -2
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 4
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.228
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.428
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.hispaniola = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.129
	title = MEC_Expeditions.129.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.129.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.caribbean = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}
			while = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				random_province = { 
					limit = { 
						province_group = expedition_provs.caribbean
						AND = { 
							NOT = { 
								country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -2
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 4
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.229
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.429
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.caribbean = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.130
	title = MEC_Expeditions.130.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.130.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.atlantic_colombia = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}
			while = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				random_province = { 
					limit = { 
						province_group = expedition_provs.atlantic_colombia
						AND = { 
							NOT = { 
								country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -2
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0

							}

									which = ari

								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari

							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.230
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.430
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.atlantic_colombia = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.131
	title = MEC_Expeditions.131.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.131.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.guyana = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}
			while = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				random_province = { 
					limit = { 
						province_group = expedition_provs.guyana
						AND = { 
							NOT = { 
								country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -2
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 4
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.231
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.431
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.guyana = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.132
	title = MEC_Expeditions.132.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.132.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.atlantic_mexico = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}
			while = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				random_province = { 
					limit = { 
						province_group = expedition_provs.atlantic_mexico
						AND = { 
							NOT = { 
								country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -2
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 4
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.232
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.432
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.atlantic_mexico = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects

country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.133
	title = MEC_Expeditions.133.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.133.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.north_brazil = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}
			while = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}

						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				random_province = { 
					limit = { 
						province_group = expedition_provs.north_brazil
						AND = { 
							NOT = { 
								country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -2
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 4
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.233
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.433
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.north_brazil = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.134
	title = MEC_Expeditions.134.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.134.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.south_brazil = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}
			while = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				random_province = { 
					limit = { 
						province_group = expedition_provs.south_brazil
						AND = { 
							NOT = { 
								country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -2
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 4
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.234
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.434
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.south_brazil = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.135
	title = MEC_Expeditions.135.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.135.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.gulf_of_mexico = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}
			while = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				random_province = { 
					limit = { 
						province_group = expedition_provs.gulf_of_mexico
						AND = { 
							NOT = { 
								country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -2
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 4
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.235
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.435
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.gulf_of_mexico = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.136
	title = MEC_Expeditions.136.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.136.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.southeastern_america = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}
			while = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}

						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				random_province = { 
					limit = { 
						province_group = expedition_provs.southeastern_america
						AND = { 
							NOT = { 
								country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}
