							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -2
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 4
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.236
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.436
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.southeastern_america = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.137
	title = MEC_Expeditions.137.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.137.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.eastern_america = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}
			while = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				random_province = { 
					limit = { 
						province_group = expedition_provs.eastern_america
						AND = { 
							NOT = { 
								country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -2
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 4
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.237
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.437
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.eastern_america = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.138
	title = MEC_Expeditions.138.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.138.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.canada = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}
			while = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				random_province = { 
					limit = { 
						province_group = expedition_provs.canada
						AND = { 
							NOT = { 
								country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -2
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 4
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.238
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.438
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.canada = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.139
	title = MEC_Expeditions.139.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.139.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.north_atlantic = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}
			while = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				random_province = { 
					limit = { 
						province_group = expedition_provs.north_atlantic
						AND = { 
							NOT = { 
								country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -2
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 4
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.239
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.439
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.north_atlantic = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.140
	title = MEC_Expeditions.140.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.140.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.hudson_bay = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}
			while = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				random_province = { 
					limit = { 
						province_group = expedition_provs.hudson_bay
						AND = { 
							NOT = { 
								country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -2
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 4
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.240
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.440
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.hudson_bay = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.141
	title = MEC_Expeditions.141.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.141.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.la_plata = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}
			while = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				random_province = { 
					limit = { 
						province_group = expedition_provs.la_plata
						AND = { 
							NOT = { 
								country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -2
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 4
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.241
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.441
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.la_plata = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.142
	title = MEC_Expeditions.142.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.142.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.california = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}
			while = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				random_province = { 
					limit = { 
						province_group = expedition_provs.california
						AND = { 
							NOT = { 
								country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -2
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 4
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.242
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.442
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.california = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.143
	title = MEC_Expeditions.143.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.143.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.alaska = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}
			while = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				random_province = { 
					limit = { 
						province_group = expedition_provs.alaska
						AND = { 
							NOT = { 
								country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -2
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 4
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.243
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.443
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.alaska = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}

country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.144
	title = MEC_Expeditions.144.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.144.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.pacific_mexico = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}
			while = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}

						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}

							NOT = {

									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}

							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -2
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 4
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.244
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.444
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.pacific_mexico = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.145
	title = MEC_Expeditions.145.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.145.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.pacific_central_america = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}
			while = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				random_province = { 
					limit = { 
						province_group = expedition_provs.pacific_central_america
						AND = { 
							NOT = { 
								country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -2
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 4
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.245
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.445
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.pacific_central_america = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.146
	title = MEC_Expeditions.146.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.146.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.peru = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}
			while = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				random_province = { 
					limit = { 
						province_group = expedition_provs.peru
						AND = { 
							NOT = { 
								country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -2
							}

						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -1
							}

							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari

							}
						}
						else_if = {
