								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 4
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.246
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.446
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.peru = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.147
	title = MEC_Expeditions.147.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.147.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	hidden = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.arrival
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				expedition_provs.chile = { 
					AND = { 
						NOT = { 
							country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								ROOT = { 
									truce_with = PREV
								}
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								overlord_of = ROOT
							}
						}
						NOT = { 
							owner = { 
								OR = { 
									alliance_with = ROOT
									overlord = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arm
				value = 20
			}
			set_variable = { 
				which = arn
				value = 1000
			}
			while = { 
				limit = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						NOT = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = arn
								value = 0
							}
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arl
						which = arn
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arl
						value = 5
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arm
						which = arl
					}
				}
				else = { 
					subtract_variable = { 
						which = arm
						value = 1
					}
				}
				random_province = { 
					limit = { 
						province_group = expedition_provs.chile
						AND = { 
							NOT = { 
								country_or_vassal_holds = ROOT
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									ROOT = { 
										truce_with = PREV
									}
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									overlord_of = ROOT
								}
							}
							NOT = { 
								owner = { 
									OR = { 
										alliance_with = ROOT
										overlord = { 
											alliance_with = ROOT
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_empty = yes
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = 0
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -5
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arf
								value = -1
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -3
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -2
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arg
								value = -1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
					}
					else = { 
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = mil_tech
							who = owner
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arf
							which = export
						}
						export_to_variable = { 
							which = export
							value = trigger_value:fort_level
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arg
							which = export
						}
						multiply_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = 2
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								is_colony = yes
							}
							change_variable = { 
								which = arh
								value = -5
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = ary
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brv
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = brw
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = ari
							which = bry
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 7
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 4
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = ari
									value = 2
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 1
							}
						}
						else = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 0
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 0
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 700
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 4
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 400
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 2
							}
						}
						else_if = { 
							limit = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = abt
									value = 100
								}
							}
							set_variable = { 
								which = arj
								value = 1
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = aro
							value = 0
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arf
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arg
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arh
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = ari
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = aro
							which = arj
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arn
						which = ROOT
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							NOT = { 
								check_variable = { 
									which = aro
									which = arn
								}
							}
						}
						save_event_target_as = MEC_Expedition_Target_Province
						set_variable = { 
							which = arn
							which = aro
						}
						ROOT = { 
							set_variable = { 
								which = arn
								which = PREV
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
			event_target:MEC_Expedition_Target_Province = { 
				province_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.247
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.447
				days = 0
			}
		}
		expedition_provs.chile = { 
			clr_province_flag = MEC_Expeditions_owned_by_sender_or_subjects
		}
	}
}
province_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.200
	title = MEC_Expeditions.200.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.200.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_empty = no
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = FROM
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = owner
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = trigger_value:fort_level
					who = ROOT
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arh
					which = export
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = arh
					value = 2
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = arh
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 5
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ari
					value = 0
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = ary
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brv
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brw
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = bry
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 7
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 700
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 400
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 100
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				subtract_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = arg
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.colony
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = yes
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.300
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.reject_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 6
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 5
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 6
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 4
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 10
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 3
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 16
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 2
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 20
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 1
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 100
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 10
				}
			}
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.300
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				90 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.300
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.400
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_british_isles
								duration = 7300
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				80 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.300
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				20 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.400
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_british_isles
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 7
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				70 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.300
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				30 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.400
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_british_isles
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 6
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				60 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.300
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				40 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.400
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_british_isles
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 5
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				50 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.300
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				50 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.400
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_british_isles
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 4
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				40 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.300
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				60 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.400
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_british_isles
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 3
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				30 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.300
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				70 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.400
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_british_isles
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.700
					days = 0
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_british_isles
						duration = 3650
						hidden = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.accept_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 9
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 7
				}
			}
		}
		owner = { 
			add_treasury = 100
			add_truce_with = FROM
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.300
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
province_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.201
	title = MEC_Expeditions.201.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.201.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_empty = no
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = FROM
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = owner
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = export
				}

		name = MEC_Expeditions.colony
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = yes
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.301
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.reject_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 6
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 5
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 6
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 4
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 10
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 3
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 16
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 2
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 20
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 1
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 100
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 10
				}
			}
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.301
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				90 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.301
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.401
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_northern_europe
								duration = 7300
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				80 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.301
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				20 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.401
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_northern_europe
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 7
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				70 = { 
					FROM = {

							id = MEC_Expeditions.301
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}

						}

			}

					which = kct

					}
				}

						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.401
							days = 0

					days = 0

				hidden_effect = { 
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_northern_europe
						duration = 3650
						hidden = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.accept_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 9
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 7
				}
			}
		}
		owner = { 
			add_treasury = 100
			add_truce_with = FROM
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.301
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}

province_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.202
	title = MEC_Expeditions.202.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.202.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_empty = no
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = FROM
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = owner
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = trigger_value:fort_level
					who = ROOT
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arh
					which = export
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = arh
					value = 2
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = arh
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 5
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ari
					value = 0
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = ary
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brv
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brw
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = bry
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 7
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 700
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 400
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 100
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				subtract_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = arg
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.colony
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = yes
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.302
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.reject_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 6
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 5
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 6
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 4
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 10
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 3
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 16
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 2
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 20
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 1
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 100
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 10
				}
			}

					}
				}

						country_event = {

					value = 1
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 100
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 10
				}
			}
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.303
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				90 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.303
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.403
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_iberia
								duration = 7300
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				80 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.303
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				20 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.403
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_iberia
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 7
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				70 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.303
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				30 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.403
							days = 0
						}

					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 6
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				60 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.303
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				40 = {

							id = MEC_Expeditions.403

					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 4
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				40 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.303
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				60 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.403
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_iberia
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 3
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				30 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.303
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				70 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.403
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_iberia
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.703
					days = 0
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_iberia
						duration = 3650
						hidden = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.accept_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 9
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 7
				}
			}
		}
		owner = { 
			add_treasury = 100
			add_truce_with = FROM
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.303
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}

province_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.204
	title = MEC_Expeditions.204.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.204.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_empty = no
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = FROM
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = owner
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = trigger_value:fort_level
					who = ROOT
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arh
					which = export
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = arh
					value = 2
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = arh
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 5
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ari
					value = 0
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = ary
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brv
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brw
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = bry
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 7
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 700
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 400
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 100
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				subtract_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = arg
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.colony
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = yes
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.304
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.reject_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 6
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 5
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 6
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 4
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 10
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 3
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 16
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 2
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 20
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 1
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 100
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 10
				}
			}
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.304
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				90 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.304
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.404
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_iberian_islands
								duration = 7300
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}

				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				90 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.305
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.405
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_northwest_africa
								duration = 7300
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct

				40 = {

							id = MEC_Expeditions.305
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				60 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.405
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = {

							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {

				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 3
				}

			random_list = { 
				30 = {

					}

				70 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.405
							days = 0
						}

							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_northwest_africa
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.705
					days = 0
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_northwest_africa
						duration = 3650
						hidden = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.accept_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 9
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 7
				}
			}
		}
		owner = { 
			add_treasury = 100
			add_truce_with = FROM
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.305
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}

province_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.206
	title = MEC_Expeditions.206.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.206.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_empty = no
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = FROM
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = owner
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = trigger_value:fort_level
					who = ROOT
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arh
					which = export
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = arh
					value = 2
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = arh
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 5
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ari
					value = 0
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = ary
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brv
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brw
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = bry
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 7
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 700
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 400
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 100
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				subtract_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = arg
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.colony
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = yes
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.306
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.reject_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 6
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 5
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 6
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 4
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 10
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 3
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 16
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 2
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 20
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 1
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 100
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 10
				}
			}
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.306
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				90 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.306
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.406
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_west_africa
								duration = 7300
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				80 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.306
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				20 = {

						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.406
							days = 0

								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_gulf_of_guinea
								duration = 7300
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				80 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.307
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				20 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.407
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_gulf_of_guinea
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 7
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				70 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.307
							days = 0
						}
					}

					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.407
							days = 0

				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 6
				}

			random_list = {

			}
		}

				check_variable = { 
					which = kct

				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				40 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.307
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				60 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.407
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_gulf_of_guinea
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 3
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				30 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.307
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				70 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.407
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_gulf_of_guinea
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.707
					days = 0
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_gulf_of_guinea
						duration = 3650
						hidden = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.accept_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 9
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 7
				}
			}
		}
		owner = { 
			add_treasury = 100
			add_truce_with = FROM
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.307
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
province_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.208
	title = MEC_Expeditions.208.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.208.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_empty = no
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = FROM
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = owner
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = trigger_value:fort_level
					who = ROOT
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arh
					which = export
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = arh
					value = 2
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = arh
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 5
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ari
					value = 0
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = ary
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brv
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brw
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = bry
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 7
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 700
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 400
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 100
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				subtract_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = arg
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.colony
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = yes
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.308
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.reject_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 6
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 5
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 6
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 4
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 10
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 3
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 16
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 2
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 20
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 1
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 100
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 10
				}
			}
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.308
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				90 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.308
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.408
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_central_africa
								duration = 7300
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				80 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.308
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				20 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.408
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_central_africa
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct

				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				70 = { 
					FROM = {

					}
				}

					}
				}
				40 = {

							id = MEC_Expeditions.309
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				20 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.409
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_south_africa
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}

		name = MEC_Expeditions.accept_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 9
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 7
				}
			}
		}
		owner = { 
			add_treasury = 100
			add_truce_with = FROM
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.309
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}

province_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.210
	title = MEC_Expeditions.210.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.210.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_empty = no
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = FROM
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = owner
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = trigger_value:fort_level
					who = ROOT
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arh
					which = export
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = arh
					value = 2
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = arh
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 5
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ari
					value = 0
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = ary
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brv
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brw
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = bry
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 7
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 700
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 400
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 100
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				subtract_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = arg
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.colony
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = yes
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.310
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.reject_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 6
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 5
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 6
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 4
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 10
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 3
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 16
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 2
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 20
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 1
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 100
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 10
				}
			}
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.310
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				90 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.310
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.410
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_east_africa
								duration = 7300
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				80 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.310
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				20 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.410
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_east_africa
								duration = 3650

					}
				}
			}
		}

				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 7
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				70 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.311
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				30 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.411
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_indian_ocean
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 6
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				60 = { 
					FROM = {

								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 4
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				40 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.311
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				60 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.411
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_indian_ocean
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 3
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				30 = { 
					FROM = {

							id = MEC_Expeditions.311
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				70 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.411
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_indian_ocean
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.711
					days = 0
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_indian_ocean
						duration = 3650
						hidden = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.accept_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 9
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 7
				}
			}
		}
		owner = { 
			add_treasury = 100
			add_truce_with = FROM
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.311
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}

province_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.212
	title = MEC_Expeditions.212.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.212.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_empty = no
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = FROM
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = owner
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = trigger_value:fort_level
					who = ROOT
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arh
					which = export
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = arh
					value = 2
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = arh
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 5
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ari
					value = 0
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = ary
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brv
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brw
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = bry
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 7
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 700
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 400
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 100
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				subtract_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = arg
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.colony
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = yes
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.312
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.reject_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 6
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 5
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 6
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 4
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 10
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 3
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 16
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 2
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 20
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 1
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 100
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 10
				}
			}
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.312
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				90 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.312
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.412
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_arabia
								duration = 7300
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				80 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.312
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				20 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.412
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_arabia
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 7
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				70 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.312
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				30 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.412
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = {

								duration = 3650

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 6
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				60 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.312
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				40 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.412
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_arabia
								duration = 3650

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {

				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				50 = {

						}
					}
				}
				50 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.412
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_arabia
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 4
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				40 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.312
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				60 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.412
							days = 0

								duration = 3650

					}

							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_western_india
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 6
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				60 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.313
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				40 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.413
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_western_india
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 5
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				50 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.313
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				50 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.413
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_western_india
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 4
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				40 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.313
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				60 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.413
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_western_india
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 3
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				30 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.313
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				70 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.413
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_western_india
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.713
					days = 0
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_western_india
						duration = 3650
						hidden = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.accept_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 9
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 7
				}
			}
		}
		owner = { 
			add_treasury = 100
			add_truce_with = FROM
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.313
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
province_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.214
	title = MEC_Expeditions.214.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.214.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_empty = no
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = FROM
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = owner
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = trigger_value:fort_level
					who = ROOT
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arh
					which = export
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = arh
					value = 2
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = arh
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 5
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ari
					value = 0
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = ary
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brv
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brw
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = bry
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 7
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 700
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 400
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 100
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				subtract_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = arg
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.colony
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = yes
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.314
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.reject_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 6
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 5
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 6
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 4
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 10
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 3
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 16
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 2
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 20
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 1
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 100
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 10
				}
			}
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.314
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				90 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.314
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.414
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_southern_india
								duration = 7300
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				80 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.314
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				20 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.414
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_southern_india
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct

				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				70 = {

							id = MEC_Expeditions.314

				}

			random_list = {

				}

						}

				}
				40 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.415
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_eastern_india
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 5
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				50 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.315
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				50 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.415
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_eastern_india
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 4
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				40 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.315
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				60 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.415
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_eastern_india
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 3
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				30 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.315
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				70 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.415
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_eastern_india
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.715
					days = 0
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_eastern_india
						duration = 3650
						hidden = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.accept_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 9
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 7
				}
			}
		}
		owner = { 
			add_treasury = 100
			add_truce_with = FROM
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.315
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}

province_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.216
	title = MEC_Expeditions.216.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.216.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_empty = no
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = FROM
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = owner
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = trigger_value:fort_level
					who = ROOT
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arh
					which = export
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = arh
					value = 2
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = arh
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 5
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ari
					value = 0
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = ary
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brv
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brw
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = bry
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 7
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 700
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 400
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 100
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				subtract_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = arg
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.colony
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = yes
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.316
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.reject_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 6
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 5
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 6
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 4
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 10
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 3
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 16
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 2
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 20
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 1
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 100
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 10
				}
			}
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.316
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				90 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.316
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.416
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_malacca
								duration = 7300
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				80 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.316
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				20 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.416
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_malacca
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}

					}
				}
			}
		}

			}
