			random_list = { 
				50 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.317
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				50 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.417
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_southeast_asia
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 4
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				40 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.317
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				60 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.417
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_southeast_asia
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 3
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				30 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.317
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				70 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.417
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_southeast_asia
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.717
					days = 0
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_southeast_asia
						duration = 3650
						hidden = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.accept_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 9
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 7
				}
			}
		}
		owner = { 
			add_treasury = 100
			add_truce_with = FROM
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.317
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
province_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.218
	title = MEC_Expeditions.218.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.218.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_empty = no
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = FROM
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = owner
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = trigger_value:fort_level
					who = ROOT
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arh
					which = export
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = arh
					value = 2
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = arh
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 5
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ari
					value = 0
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = ary
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brv
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brw
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = bry
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 7
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 700
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 400
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 100
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				subtract_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = arg
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.colony
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = yes
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.318
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.reject_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 6
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 5
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 6
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 4
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 10
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 3
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 16
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 2
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 20
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 1
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 100
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 10
				}
			}
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.318
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				90 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.318
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.418
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_indonesia
								duration = 7300
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				80 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.318
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				20 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.418
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_indonesia
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 7
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				70 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.318
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				30 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.418
							days = 0

						hidden_effect = {

			}
		}
		else_if = {

					which = kct
					value = 6
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				60 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.318
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				40 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.418
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = {

								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_indonesia
								duration = 3650

				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {

								duration = 3650

					}
				}
			}
		}

			random_list = {

			}

		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 4
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				40 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.319
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				60 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.419
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_philippines
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 3
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				30 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.319
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				70 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.419
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_philippines
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.719
					days = 0
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_philippines
						duration = 3650
						hidden = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.accept_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 9
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 7
				}
			}
		}
		owner = { 
			add_treasury = 100
			add_truce_with = FROM
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.319
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
province_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.220
	title = MEC_Expeditions.220.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.220.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_empty = no
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = FROM
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = owner
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = trigger_value:fort_level
					who = ROOT
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arh
					which = export
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = arh
					value = 2
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = arh
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 5
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ari
					value = 0
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = ary
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brv
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brw
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = bry
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 7
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 700
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 400
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 100
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				subtract_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = arg
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.colony
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = yes
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.320
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.reject_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 6
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 5
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 6
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 4
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 10
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 3
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 16
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 2
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 20
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 1
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 100
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 10
				}
			}
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.320
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				90 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.320
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.420
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_papua
								duration = 7300
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				80 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.320
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}

					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.420
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_papua
								duration = 3650

					}
				}
			}
		}

			}

							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_australia
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 3
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				30 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.321
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				70 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.421
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_australia
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.721
					days = 0
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_australia
						duration = 3650
						hidden = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.accept_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 9
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 7
				}
			}
		}
		owner = { 
			add_treasury = 100
			add_truce_with = FROM
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.321
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
province_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.222
	title = MEC_Expeditions.222.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.222.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_empty = no
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = FROM
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = owner
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = trigger_value:fort_level
					who = ROOT
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arh
					which = export
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = arh
					value = 2
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = arh
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 5
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ari
					value = 0
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = ary
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brv
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brw
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = bry
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 7
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 700
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 400
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 100
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				subtract_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = arg
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.colony
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = yes
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.322
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.reject_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 6
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 5
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 6
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 4
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 10
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 3
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 16
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 2
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 20
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 1
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 100
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 10
				}
			}
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.322
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				90 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.322
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.422
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_pacific_islands
								duration = 7300
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				80 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.322
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				20 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.422
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_pacific_islands
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 7
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				70 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.322

						}
					}
				}

			}

						}
					}
				}

						}
					}
				}
				70 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.423
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_southern_china
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.723
					days = 0
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_southern_china
						duration = 3650
						hidden = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.accept_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 9
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 7
				}
			}
		}
		owner = { 
			add_treasury = 100
			add_truce_with = FROM
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.323
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}

province_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.224
	title = MEC_Expeditions.224.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.224.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_empty = no
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = FROM
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = owner
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = trigger_value:fort_level
					who = ROOT
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arh
					which = export
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = arh
					value = 2
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = arh
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 5
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ari
					value = 0
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = ary
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brv
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brw
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = bry
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 7
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 700
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 400
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 100
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				subtract_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = arg
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.colony
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = yes
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.324
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.reject_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 6
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 5
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 6
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 4
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 10
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 3
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 16
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 2
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 20
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 1
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 100
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 10
				}
			}
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.324
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				90 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.324
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.424
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_northern_china
								duration = 7300
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				80 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.324

						}
					}
				}

						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.424
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = {

								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_northern_china

					}
				}
			}
		}

					id = MEC_Expeditions.725
					days = 0
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_korea
						duration = 3650
						hidden = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.accept_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 9
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 7
				}
			}
		}
		owner = { 
			add_treasury = 100
			add_truce_with = FROM
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.325
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}

province_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.226
	title = MEC_Expeditions.226.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.226.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_empty = no
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = FROM
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = owner
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = trigger_value:fort_level
					who = ROOT
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arh
					which = export
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = arh
					value = 2
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = arh
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 5
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ari
					value = 0
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = ary
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brv
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brw
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = bry
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 7
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 700
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 400
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 100
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				subtract_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = arg
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.colony
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = yes
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.326
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.reject_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 6
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 5
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 6
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 4
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 10
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 3
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 16
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 2
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 20
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 1
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 100
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 10
				}
			}
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.326
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				90 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.326
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.426
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_japan
								duration = 7300
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				80 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.326
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				20 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.426
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_japan
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 7
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				70 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.326
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}

					}
				}

			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 7
				}
			}
		}
		owner = { 
			add_treasury = 100
			add_truce_with = FROM
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.327
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
province_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.228
	title = MEC_Expeditions.228.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.228.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_empty = no
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = FROM
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = owner
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = trigger_value:fort_level
					who = ROOT
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arh
					which = export
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = arh
					value = 2
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = arh
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 5
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ari
					value = 0
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = ary
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brv
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brw
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = bry
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 7
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 700
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 400
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 100
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				subtract_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = arg
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.colony
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = yes
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.328
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.reject_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 6
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 5
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 6
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 4
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 10
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 3
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 16
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 2
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 20
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 1
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 100
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 10
				}
			}
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.328
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				90 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.328
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.428
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_hispaniola
								duration = 7300
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				80 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.328
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				20 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.428
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_hispaniola
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 7
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				70 = { 
					FROM = {

							id = MEC_Expeditions.328

						}
					}
				}

				}
			}
			random_list = {

					FROM = {

						}
					}
				}

province_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.230
	title = MEC_Expeditions.230.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.230.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_empty = no
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = FROM
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = owner
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = trigger_value:fort_level
					who = ROOT
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arh
					which = export
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = arh
					value = 2
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = arh
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 5
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ari
					value = 0
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = ary
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brv
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brw
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = bry
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 7
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 700
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 400
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 100
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				subtract_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = arg
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.colony
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = yes
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.330
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.reject_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 6
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 5
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 6
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 4
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 10
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 3
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 16
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 2
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 20
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 1
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 100
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 10
				}
			}
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.330
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				90 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.330
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.430
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_atlantic_colombia
								duration = 7300
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				80 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.330
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				20 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.430
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_atlantic_colombia
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 7
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				70 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.330
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				30 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.430
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_atlantic_colombia
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 6
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				60 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.330
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				40 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.430
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_atlantic_colombia
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 5
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				50 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.330
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				50 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.430
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_atlantic_colombia
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 4
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				40 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.330
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				60 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.430
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_atlantic_colombia
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 3
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				30 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.330
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				70 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.430
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_atlantic_colombia
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.730
					days = 0
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_atlantic_colombia
						duration = 3650
						hidden = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.accept_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 9
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 7
				}
			}
		}
		owner = { 
			add_treasury = 100
			add_truce_with = FROM
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.330
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}
}

	id = MEC_Expeditions.231

	desc = MEC_Expeditions.231.desc

					which = arh

						value = 5
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ari
					value = 0
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = ary
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brv
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brw
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = bry
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 7
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 700
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 400
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 100
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				subtract_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = arg
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.colony
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = yes
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.331
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.reject_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 6
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 5
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 6
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 4
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 10
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 3
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 16
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 2
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 20
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 1
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 100
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 10
				}
			}
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.331
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				90 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.331
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.431
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_guyana
								duration = 7300
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				80 = { 
					FROM = {

							id = MEC_Expeditions.331

						}

						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.431
							days = 0
						}

					}
				}
			}

								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.731
					days = 0
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_guyana
						duration = 3650
						hidden = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}

		name = MEC_Expeditions.accept_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no

			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 9
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}

				factor = 2

province_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.232
	title = MEC_Expeditions.232.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.232.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_empty = no
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = FROM
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = owner
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = trigger_value:fort_level
					who = ROOT
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arh
					which = export
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = arh
					value = 2
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = arh
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 5
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ari
					value = 0
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = ary
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brv
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brw
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = bry
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 7
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 700
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 400
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 100
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				subtract_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = arg
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.colony
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = yes
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.332
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.reject_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 6
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 5
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 6
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 4
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 10
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 3
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 16
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 2
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 20
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 1
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 100
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 10
				}
			}
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.332
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				90 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.332
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.432
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_atlantic_mexico
								duration = 7300
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				80 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.332
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				20 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.432
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_atlantic_mexico
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 7
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				70 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.332
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				30 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.432
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_atlantic_mexico
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 6
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				60 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.332
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				40 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.432
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_atlantic_mexico
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 5
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				50 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.332
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				50 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.432
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_atlantic_mexico
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 4
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				40 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.332
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				60 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.432
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_atlantic_mexico
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 3
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				30 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.332
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				70 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.432
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_atlantic_mexico
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.732
					days = 0
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_atlantic_mexico
						duration = 3650
						hidden = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.accept_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 9
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 7
				}
			}
		}
		owner = { 
			add_treasury = 100
			add_truce_with = FROM
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.332
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
province_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.233
	title = MEC_Expeditions.233.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.233.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_empty = no
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = FROM
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = owner
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = trigger_value:fort_level
					who = ROOT
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arh
					which = export
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = arh
					value = 2
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = arh
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 5
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ari
					value = 0
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = ary
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brv
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brw
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = bry
				}
				if = {

						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 7
						}
					}
					change_variable = {

						}

					}

	id = MEC_Expeditions.234
	title = MEC_Expeditions.234.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.234.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture

	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_empty = no
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech

				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = owner
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export

					which = arh

				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = arh
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 5
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ari
					value = 0
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = ary
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brv
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brw
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = bry
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 7
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 700
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 400
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 100
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				subtract_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = arg
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.colony
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = yes
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.334
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.reject_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 6
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 5
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 6
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 4
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 10
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 3
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 16
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 2
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 20
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 1
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 100
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 10
				}
			}
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.334
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				90 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.334
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.434
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_south_brazil
								duration = 7300
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				80 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.334
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				20 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.434
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_south_brazil
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 7
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				70 = { 
					FROM = {

				}

			random_list = {

					days = 0

						name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_south_brazil
						duration = 3650
						hidden = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.accept_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 9
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 7
				}
			}
		}
		owner = { 
			add_treasury = 100
			add_truce_with = FROM
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.334
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}

province_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.235
	title = MEC_Expeditions.235.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.235.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_empty = no
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = FROM
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = owner
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = trigger_value:fort_level
					who = ROOT
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arh
					which = export
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = arh
					value = 2
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = arh
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 5
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ari
					value = 0
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = ary
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brv
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brw
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = bry
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 7
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}

					}

							which = ari

						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 700
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4

					}

						which = arg

					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 100
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				subtract_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = arg
				}
			}
		}

				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brv
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brw
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = bry
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 7
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 700
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 400
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 100
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				subtract_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = arg
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.colony
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = yes
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.336
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.reject_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 6
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 5
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 6
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 4
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 10
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 3
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 16
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 2
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 20
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 1
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 100
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 10
				}
			}
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.336
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				90 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.336
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				10 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.436
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_southeastern_america
								duration = 7300
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				80 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.336
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				20 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.436
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_southeastern_america
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 7
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				70 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.336
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				30 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.436
							days = 0
						}

								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 6
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				60 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.336
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				40 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.436
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = {

					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 5
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				50 = {

					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = {

				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 4
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				40 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.336
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				60 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.436
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = {

								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_southeastern_america
								duration = 3650

						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 3
				}
			}
			random_list = { 
				30 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.336
							days = 0
						}
					}
				}
				70 = { 
					FROM = { 
						country_event = { 
							id = MEC_Expeditions.436
							days = 0
						}
						hidden_effect = { 
							add_country_modifier = { 
								name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_southeastern_america
								duration = 3650
								hidden = yes
							}
						}
					}
				}
			}
		}
		else = { 
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.736
					days = 0
				}
				hidden_effect = { 
					add_country_modifier = { 
						name = MEC_Modifier_Expedition_Failed_southeastern_america
						duration = 3650
						hidden = yes
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.accept_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 9
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 8
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 7
				}
			}
		}
		owner = { 
			add_treasury = 100
			add_truce_with = FROM
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.336
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}
}
province_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.237
	title = MEC_Expeditions.237.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.237.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			if = { 
				limit = { 
					is_empty = no
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = FROM
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = mil_tech
					who = owner
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = export
				}
				export_to_variable = { 
					which = export
					value = trigger_value:fort_level
					who = ROOT
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = arh
					which = export
				}
				multiply_variable = { 
					which = arh
					value = 2
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = arg
					which = arh
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 5
					}
				}
				set_variable = { 
					which = ari
					value = 0
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = ary
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brv
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = brw
				}
				change_variable = { 
					which = ari
					which = bry
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 7
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 700
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 400
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 100
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				subtract_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = arg
				}
			}
		}
	}

				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 700
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 4
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 400
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
				}
				else_if = { 
					limit = { 
						check_variable = { 
							which = abt
							value = 100
						}
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 1
					}
				}
				subtract_variable = { 
					which = kct
					which = arg
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.colony
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = yes
		}
		FROM = { 
			country_event = { 
				id = MEC_Expeditions.338
				days = 0
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.reject_trade_fort
		trigger = { 
			is_empty = no
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
			modifier = { 
				factor = 2
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 6
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 4
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 5
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 6
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 4
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 10
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 3
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 16
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 2
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 20
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 1
				}
			}
			modifier = { 
				factor = 100
				NOT = { 
					check_variable = { 
						which = kct
						value = 1
					}
				}
			}
		}
		if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 10
				}
			}
			FROM = { 
				country_event = { 
					id = MEC_Expeditions.338
					days = 0
				}
			}
		}
		else_if = { 
			limit = { 
				check_variable = { 
					which = kct
					value = 9
				}
			}

					FROM = {
