											}
										}
										floodplains = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 2.75
											}
										}
										taiga = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1.5
											}
										}
										marsh = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 2
											}
										}
										alpine_tundra = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										tundra = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										small_island = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1
											}
										}
									}
								}
								every_neighbor_province = { 
									limit = { 
										has_province_flag = possible_malaria
									}
									clr_province_flag = possible_malaria
									set_variable = { 
										which = lax
										value = 0
									}
									if = { 
										limit = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = nla
												value = 15.5
											}
										}
										if = { 
											limit = { 
												check_variable = { 
													which = nla
													value = 17.5
												}
											}
											if = { 
												limit = { 
													check_variable = { 
														which = nla
														value = 19.5
													}
												}
												if = { 
													limit = { 
														check_variable = { 
															which = nla
															value = 21.5
														}
													}
													if = { 
														limit = { 
															check_variable = { 
																which = nla
																value = 23.5
															}
														}
														change_variable = { 
															which = lax
															value = 7
														}
													}
													else = { 
														change_variable = { 
															which = lax
															value = 5
														}
													}
												}
												else = { 
													change_variable = { 
														which = lax
														value = 4
													}
												}
											}
											else = { 
												change_variable = { 
													which = lax
													value = 3
												}
											}
										}
										else = { 
											change_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1
											}
										}
									}
									if = { 
										limit = { 
											has_terrain = marsh
											check_variable = { 
												which = nla
												value = 13
											}
										}
										change_variable = { 
											which = lax
											value = 2
										}
									}
									trigger_switch = { 
										on_trigger = has_terrain
										arctic = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										forest_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1.2
											}
										}
										forest_hills = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.75
											}
										}
										forest_mountains = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
										forest_highlands = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										wood_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1.5
											}
										}
										wood_hills = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.75
											}
										}
										wood_mountains = { 
											multiply_variable = {

											}
										}
										wood_highlands = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.75
											}
										}
										shrub_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1
											}
										}
										shrub_hills = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.75
											}
										}
										shrub_mountains = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
										shrub_highlands = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
										grass_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1.5
											}
										}
										grass_hills = { }
										grass_mountains = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										grass_highlands = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										desert_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
										desert_hills = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
										desert_mountains = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
										desert_highlands = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax

											}
										}
										jungle_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 2
											}
										}
										jungle_hills = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 2
											}
										}
										floodplains = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 2.75
											}
										}
										taiga = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1.5
											}
										}
										marsh = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 2
											}
										}
										alpine_tundra = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										tundra = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										small_island = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				random_list = { 
					1 = { 
						FROM = { 
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									continent = north_america
								}
								if = { 
									limit = { 
										has_global_flag = not_namerica_smallpox
										superregion = east_america_superregion
									}
									every_neighbor_province = { 
										limit = { 
											NOT = { 
												check_variable = { 
													which = kzx
													value = 0.1
												}
												check_variable = { 
													which = kzw
													value = 0.1
												}
											}
											owner = { 
												OR = { 
													technology_group = Andes
													technology_group = mesoamerican
													technology_group = south_american
													technology_group = high_american
												}
											}
										}
										province_event = { 
											id = Plague_Spawner.221
											days = 2555
											random = 365
										}
									}
								}
								else_if = { 
									limit = { 
										has_global_flag = not_camerica_smallpox
										superregion = central_america_superregion
									}
									every_neighbor_province = { 
										limit = { 
											NOT = { 
												check_variable = { 
													which = kzx
													value = 0.1
												}
												check_variable = { 
													which = kzw
													value = 0.1
												}
											}
											owner = { 
												OR = { 
													technology_group = Andes
													technology_group = mesoamerican
													technology_group = south_american
													technology_group = high_american
												}
											}
										}
										province_event = { 
											id = Plague_Spawner.222
											days = 2555
											random = 365
										}
									}
								}
							}
							else_if = { 
								limit = { 
									continent = south_america
									has_global_flag = not_samerica_smallpox
								}
								every_neighbor_province = { 
									limit = { 
										NOT = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = kzx
												value = 0.1
											}
											check_variable = { 
												which = kzw
												value = 0.1
											}
										}
										owner = { 
											OR = { 
												technology_group = Andes
												technology_group = mesoamerican
												technology_group = south_american
												technology_group = high_american
											}
										}
									}
									province_event = { 
										id = Plague_Spawner.2
										days = 2555
										random = 365
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					2 = { }
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_empty = no
					}
					owner = { 
						add_opinion = { 
							who = ROOT
							modifier = MEC_Expeditions_taken_province
						}
					}
				}
				cede_province = ROOT
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					add_colonysize = 1000
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.expedition_success
		add_prestige = 3
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.317
	title = MEC_Expeditions.317.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.317.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			expedition_provs.southeast_asia_vision = { 
				discover_country = ROOT
			}
			FROM = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					add_claim = owner
				}
				add_territorial_core = ROOT
				save_event_target_as = expedition_province
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_empty = yes
						has_province_flag = ColonyBecomesOwner
					}
					change_religion = ROOT
					change_culture = ROOT
					ROOT = { 
						capital_scope = { 
							FROM = { 
								set_variable = { 
									which = kzk
									which = PREV
								}
							}
							FROM = { 
								set_variable = { 
									which = kzw
									which = PREV
								}
							}
							FROM = { 
								set_variable = { 
									which = law
									which = PREV
								}
							}
							FROM = { 
								divide_variable = { 
									which = kzk
									value = 3
								}
							}
							FROM = { 
								divide_variable = { 
									which = kzw
									value = 3
								}
							}
							FROM = { 
								divide_variable = { 
									which = law
									value = 3
								}
							}
						}

							limit = {

									check_variable = { 
										which = lax
										value = 0.1
									}
								}
							}
							FROM = { 
								if = { 
									limit = { 
										has_province_flag = possible_malaria
									}
									clr_province_flag = possible_malaria
									set_variable = { 
										which = lax
										value = 0
									}
									if = { 
										limit = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = nla
												value = 15.5
											}
										}
										if = { 
											limit = { 
												check_variable = { 
													which = nla
													value = 17.5
												}
											}
											if = { 
												limit = { 
													check_variable = { 
														which = nla
														value = 19.5
													}
												}
												if = { 
													limit = { 
														check_variable = { 
															which = nla
															value = 21.5
														}
													}
													if = { 
														limit = { 
															check_variable = { 
																which = nla
																value = 23.5
															}
														}
														change_variable = { 
															which = lax
															value = 7
														}
													}
													else = { 
														change_variable = { 
															which = lax
															value = 5
														}
													}
												}
												else = { 
													change_variable = { 
														which = lax
														value = 4
													}
												}
											}
											else = { 
												change_variable = { 
													which = lax
													value = 3
												}
											}
										}
										else = { 
											change_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1
											}
										}
									}
									if = { 
										limit = { 
											has_terrain = marsh
											check_variable = { 
												which = nla
												value = 13
											}
										}
										change_variable = { 
											which = lax
											value = 2
										}
									}
									trigger_switch = { 
										on_trigger = has_terrain
										arctic = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										forest_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1.2
											}
										}
										forest_hills = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.75
											}
										}
										forest_mountains = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
										forest_highlands = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										wood_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax

											}
										}
										wood_hills = {

											}
										}

											}
										}
										wood_highlands = {

												which = lax

											}
										}
										shrub_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1
											}
										}
										shrub_hills = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.75
											}
										}
										shrub_mountains = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
										shrub_highlands = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
										grass_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1.5
											}
										}
										grass_hills = { }
										grass_mountains = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										grass_highlands = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										desert_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
										desert_hills = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
										desert_mountains = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
										desert_highlands = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										jungle_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 2
											}
										}
										jungle_hills = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 2
											}
										}
										floodplains = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 2.75
											}
										}
										taiga = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1.5
											}
										}
										marsh = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 2
											}
										}
										alpine_tundra = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										tundra = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										small_island = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1
											}
										}
									}
								}
								every_neighbor_province = { 
									limit = { 
										has_province_flag = possible_malaria
									}
									clr_province_flag = possible_malaria
									set_variable = { 
										which = lax
										value = 0
									}
									if = { 
										limit = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = nla
												value = 15.5
											}
										}
										if = { 
											limit = { 
												check_variable = { 
													which = nla
													value = 17.5
												}
											}
											if = { 
												limit = { 
													check_variable = { 
														which = nla
														value = 19.5
													}
												}
												if = { 
													limit = { 
														check_variable = { 
															which = nla
															value = 21.5
														}
													}
													if = { 
														limit = { 
															check_variable = { 
																which = nla
																value = 23.5
															}
														}
														change_variable = { 
															which = lax
															value = 7
														}
													}
													else = { 
														change_variable = { 
															which = lax
															value = 5
														}
													}
												}
												else = { 
													change_variable = { 
														which = lax
														value = 4
													}
												}
											}
											else = { 
												change_variable = { 
													which = lax
													value = 3
												}
											}
										}
										else = { 
											change_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1
											}
										}
									}
									if = { 
										limit = { 
											has_terrain = marsh
											check_variable = { 
												which = nla
												value = 13
											}
										}
										change_variable = { 
											which = lax
											value = 2
										}
									}
									trigger_switch = { 
										on_trigger = has_terrain
										arctic = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										forest_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1.2
											}
										}
										forest_hills = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.75
											}
										}
										forest_mountains = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
										forest_highlands = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										wood_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax

											}
										}
										wood_hills = {

											}
										}
										wood_mountains = {

											}
										}
										wood_highlands = {

											}
										}

											}
										}
										shrub_mountains = {

											}
										}
										shrub_highlands = {

											}
										}
										grass_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1.5
											}
										}
										grass_hills = { }
										grass_mountains = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										grass_highlands = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										desert_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
										desert_hills = {

											multiply_variable = {

											}
										}
										taiga = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1.5
											}
										}
										marsh = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 2
											}
										}
										alpine_tundra = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										tundra = { 
											multiply_variable = {

												value = 0
											}
										}
										small_island = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				random_list = { 
					1 = { 
						FROM = { 
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									continent = north_america
								}
								if = { 
									limit = { 
										has_global_flag = not_namerica_smallpox
										superregion = east_america_superregion
									}
									every_neighbor_province = { 
										limit = { 
											NOT = { 
												check_variable = { 
													which = kzx
													value = 0.1
												}
												check_variable = { 
													which = kzw
													value = 0.1
												}
											}
											owner = { 
												OR = { 
													technology_group = Andes
													technology_group = mesoamerican
													technology_group = south_american
													technology_group = high_american
												}
											}
										}
										province_event = { 
											id = Plague_Spawner.221
											days = 2555
											random = 365
										}
									}
								}
								else_if = { 
									limit = { 
										has_global_flag = not_camerica_smallpox
										superregion = central_america_superregion
									}
									every_neighbor_province = { 
										limit = { 
											NOT = { 
												check_variable = { 
													which = kzx
													value = 0.1
												}
												check_variable = { 
													which = kzw
													value = 0.1
												}
											}
											owner = { 
												OR = { 
													technology_group = Andes
													technology_group = mesoamerican
													technology_group = south_american
													technology_group = high_american
												}
											}
										}
										province_event = { 
											id = Plague_Spawner.222
											days = 2555
											random = 365
										}
									}
								}
							}
							else_if = { 
								limit = { 
									continent = south_america
									has_global_flag = not_samerica_smallpox
								}
								every_neighbor_province = { 
									limit = { 
										NOT = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = kzx
												value = 0.1
											}
											check_variable = { 
												which = kzw
												value = 0.1
											}
										}
										owner = { 
											OR = { 
												technology_group = Andes
												technology_group = mesoamerican
												technology_group = south_american
												technology_group = high_american
											}
										}
									}
									province_event = { 
										id = Plague_Spawner.2
										days = 2555
										random = 365
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					2 = { }
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_empty = no
					}
					owner = { 
						add_opinion = { 
							who = ROOT
							modifier = MEC_Expeditions_taken_province
						}
					}
				}
				cede_province = ROOT
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					add_colonysize = 1000
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.expedition_success
		add_prestige = 3
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.318
	title = MEC_Expeditions.318.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.318.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			expedition_provs.indonesia_vision = { 
				discover_country = ROOT
			}
			FROM = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					add_claim = owner
				}
				add_territorial_core = ROOT
				save_event_target_as = expedition_province
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_empty = yes
						has_province_flag = ColonyBecomesOwner
					}
					change_religion = ROOT
					change_culture = ROOT
					ROOT = { 
						capital_scope = { 
							FROM = { 
								set_variable = { 
									which = kzk
									which = PREV
								}
							}
							FROM = { 
								set_variable = { 
									which = kzw
									which = PREV
								}
							}
							FROM = { 
								set_variable = { 
									which = law
									which = PREV
								}
							}
							FROM = { 
								divide_variable = { 
									which = kzk
									value = 3
								}
							}
							FROM = { 
								divide_variable = { 
									which = kzw
									value = 3
								}
							}
							FROM = { 
								divide_variable = { 
									which = law
									value = 3
								}
							}
						}

							limit = { 
								any_owned_province = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = lax
										value = 0.1
									}
								}
							}
							FROM = { 
								if = { 
									limit = { 
										has_province_flag = possible_malaria

													change_variable = { 
														which = lax
														value = 4
													}
												}
											}
											else = { 
												change_variable = { 
													which = lax
													value = 3
												}
											}
										}
										else = { 
											change_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1
											}
										}
									}
									if = { 
										limit = { 
											has_terrain = marsh
											check_variable = { 
												which = nla
												value = 13
											}
										}
										change_variable = { 
											which = lax
											value = 2
										}
									}
									trigger_switch = { 
										on_trigger = has_terrain
										arctic = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										forest_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1.2
											}
										}
										forest_hills = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.75
											}
										}
										forest_mountains = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
										forest_highlands = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax

											}
										}
										wood_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax

											}
										}

											}
										}

											}
										}
										wood_highlands = { 
											multiply_variable = {

											}
										}
										shrub_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1
											}
										}
										shrub_hills = { 
											multiply_variable = {

											}
										}
										shrub_mountains = { 
											multiply_variable = {

											}
										}
										shrub_highlands = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax

											}
										}
										grass_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1.5
											}
										}
										grass_hills = { }
										grass_mountains = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										grass_highlands = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										desert_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
										desert_hills = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax

											}
										}
										desert_mountains = {

											}
										}

											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1.5
											}
										}
										marsh = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 2
											}
										}
										alpine_tundra = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										tundra = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										small_island = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				random_list = { 
					1 = { 
						FROM = { 
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									continent = north_america
								}
								if = { 
									limit = { 
										has_global_flag = not_namerica_smallpox
										superregion = east_america_superregion
									}
									every_neighbor_province = { 
										limit = { 
											NOT = { 
												check_variable = { 
													which = kzx
													value = 0.1
												}
												check_variable = { 
													which = kzw
													value = 0.1
												}
											}
											owner = { 
												OR = { 
													technology_group = Andes
													technology_group = mesoamerican
													technology_group = south_american
													technology_group = high_american
												}
											}
										}
										province_event = { 
											id = Plague_Spawner.221
											days = 2555
											random = 365
										}
									}
								}
								else_if = { 
									limit = { 
										has_global_flag = not_camerica_smallpox
										superregion = central_america_superregion
									}
									every_neighbor_province = { 
										limit = { 
											NOT = { 
												check_variable = { 
													which = kzx
													value = 0.1
												}
												check_variable = { 
													which = kzw
													value = 0.1
												}
											}
											owner = { 
												OR = { 
													technology_group = Andes
													technology_group = mesoamerican
													technology_group = south_american
													technology_group = high_american
												}
											}
										}
										province_event = { 
											id = Plague_Spawner.222
											days = 2555
											random = 365
										}
									}
								}
							}
							else_if = { 
								limit = { 
									continent = south_america
									has_global_flag = not_samerica_smallpox
								}
								every_neighbor_province = { 
									limit = { 
										NOT = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = kzx
												value = 0.1
											}
											check_variable = { 
												which = kzw
												value = 0.1
											}
										}
										owner = { 
											OR = { 
												technology_group = Andes
												technology_group = mesoamerican
												technology_group = south_american
												technology_group = high_american
											}
										}
									}
									province_event = { 
										id = Plague_Spawner.2
										days = 2555
										random = 365
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					2 = { }
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_empty = no
					}
					owner = { 
						add_opinion = { 
							who = ROOT
							modifier = MEC_Expeditions_taken_province
						}
					}
				}
				cede_province = ROOT
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					add_colonysize = 1000
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.expedition_success
		add_prestige = 3
	}
}

	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			expedition_provs.philippines_vision = { 
				discover_country = ROOT
			}
			FROM = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					add_claim = owner
				}
				add_territorial_core = ROOT
				save_event_target_as = expedition_province
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_empty = yes
						has_province_flag = ColonyBecomesOwner

					change_culture = ROOT

						capital_scope = {

												check_variable = { 
													which = kzw
													value = 0.1
												}
											}
											owner = { 
												OR = { 
													technology_group = Andes
													technology_group = mesoamerican
													technology_group = south_american
													technology_group = high_american
												}
											}
										}
										province_event = { 
											id = Plague_Spawner.221
											days = 2555
											random = 365
										}
									}
								}
								else_if = { 
									limit = { 
										has_global_flag = not_camerica_smallpox
										superregion = central_america_superregion
									}
									every_neighbor_province = { 
										limit = { 
											NOT = { 
												check_variable = { 
													which = kzx
													value = 0.1
												}
												check_variable = { 
													which = kzw
													value = 0.1
												}
											}
											owner = { 
												OR = { 
													technology_group = Andes
													technology_group = mesoamerican
													technology_group = south_american
													technology_group = high_american
												}
											}
										}
										province_event = { 
											id = Plague_Spawner.222
											days = 2555
											random = 365
										}
									}
								}
							}
							else_if = { 
								limit = { 
									continent = south_america
									has_global_flag = not_samerica_smallpox
								}
								every_neighbor_province = { 
									limit = { 
										NOT = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = kzx
												value = 0.1
											}
											check_variable = { 
												which = kzw
												value = 0.1
											}
										}
										owner = { 
											OR = { 
												technology_group = Andes
												technology_group = mesoamerican
												technology_group = south_american
												technology_group = high_american
											}
										}
									}
									province_event = { 
										id = Plague_Spawner.2
										days = 2555
										random = 365
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					2 = { }
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_empty = no
					}
					owner = { 
						add_opinion = { 
							who = ROOT
							modifier = MEC_Expeditions_taken_province
						}
					}
				}
				cede_province = ROOT
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					add_colonysize = 1000
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.expedition_success
		add_prestige = 3
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.320
	title = MEC_Expeditions.320.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.320.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			expedition_provs.papua_vision = { 
				discover_country = ROOT
			}
			FROM = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					add_claim = owner
				}
				add_territorial_core = ROOT
				save_event_target_as = expedition_province
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_empty = yes
						has_province_flag = ColonyBecomesOwner
					}
					change_religion = ROOT
					change_culture = ROOT
					ROOT = { 
						capital_scope = { 
							FROM = { 
								set_variable = { 
									which = kzk
									which = PREV
								}
							}
							FROM = { 
								set_variable = { 
									which = kzw
									which = PREV
								}
							}
							FROM = { 
								set_variable = { 
									which = law
									which = PREV
								}
							}
							FROM = { 
								divide_variable = { 
									which = kzk
									value = 3
								}
							}
							FROM = { 
								divide_variable = { 
									which = kzw
									value = 3
								}
							}
							FROM = { 
								divide_variable = { 
									which = law
									value = 3
								}
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								any_owned_province = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = lax
										value = 0.1
									}
								}
							}
							FROM = { 
								if = { 
									limit = { 
										has_province_flag = possible_malaria
									}
									clr_province_flag = possible_malaria
									set_variable = { 
										which = lax
										value = 0
									}
									if = { 
										limit = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = nla
												value = 15.5
											}
										}
										if = { 
											limit = { 
												check_variable = { 
													which = nla
													value = 17.5
												}
											}
											if = { 
												limit = { 
													check_variable = { 
														which = nla
														value = 19.5
													}
												}
												if = { 
													limit = { 
														check_variable = { 
															which = nla
															value = 21.5
														}
													}
													if = { 
														limit = { 
															check_variable = { 
																which = nla
																value = 23.5
															}
														}
														change_variable = { 
															which = lax
															value = 7
														}
													}
													else = { 
														change_variable = { 
															which = lax
															value = 5
														}
													}
												}
												else = { 
													change_variable = { 
														which = lax
														value = 4
													}
												}
											}
											else = { 
												change_variable = { 
													which = lax
													value = 3
												}
											}
										}
										else = { 
											change_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1
											}
										}
									}
									if = { 
										limit = { 
											has_terrain = marsh
											check_variable = { 
												which = nla
												value = 13
											}
										}
										change_variable = { 
											which = lax
											value = 2
										}
									}
									trigger_switch = { 
										on_trigger = has_terrain
										arctic = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										forest_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1.2
											}
										}
										forest_hills = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.75
											}
										}
										forest_mountains = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
										forest_highlands = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										wood_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1.5
											}
										}
										wood_hills = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.75
											}
										}
										wood_mountains = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.25
											}
										}
										wood_highlands = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.75
											}
										}
										shrub_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1
											}
										}
										shrub_hills = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.75
											}
										}
										shrub_mountains = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
										shrub_highlands = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
										grass_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1.5
											}
										}
										grass_hills = { }
										grass_mountains = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										grass_highlands = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										desert_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
										desert_hills = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
										desert_mountains = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
										desert_highlands = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										jungle_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 2
											}
										}
										jungle_hills = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 2
											}
										}
										floodplains = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 2.75
											}
										}
										taiga = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1.5
											}
										}
										marsh = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 2
											}
										}
										alpine_tundra = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										tundra = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										small_island = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1
											}
										}
									}
								}
								every_neighbor_province = { 
									limit = { 
										has_province_flag = possible_malaria
									}
									clr_province_flag = possible_malaria
									set_variable = { 
										which = lax
										value = 0
									}
									if = { 
										limit = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = nla
												value = 15.5
											}
										}
										if = { 
											limit = { 
												check_variable = { 
													which = nla
													value = 17.5
												}
											}
											if = { 
												limit = { 
													check_variable = { 
														which = nla
														value = 19.5
													}
												}
												if = { 
													limit = { 
														check_variable = { 
															which = nla
															value = 21.5
														}
													}
													if = { 
														limit = { 
															check_variable = { 
																which = nla
																value = 23.5
															}
														}
														change_variable = { 
															which = lax
															value = 7
														}
													}
													else = { 
														change_variable = { 
															which = lax
															value = 5
														}
													}
												}
												else = { 
													change_variable = { 
														which = lax
														value = 4
													}
												}
											}
											else = { 
												change_variable = { 
													which = lax
													value = 3
												}
											}
										}
										else = { 
											change_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1
											}
										}
									}
									if = { 
										limit = { 
											has_terrain = marsh
											check_variable = { 
												which = nla
												value = 13
											}
										}
										change_variable = { 
											which = lax
											value = 2
										}
									}
									trigger_switch = { 
										on_trigger = has_terrain
										arctic = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										forest_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1.2
											}
										}
										forest_hills = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.75
											}
										}
										forest_mountains = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
										forest_highlands = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										wood_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1.5
											}
										}
										wood_hills = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.75
											}
										}
										wood_mountains = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.25
											}
										}
										wood_highlands = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.75
											}
										}
										shrub_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1
											}
										}
										shrub_hills = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.75
											}
										}
										shrub_mountains = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
										shrub_highlands = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
										grass_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1.5
											}
										}
										grass_hills = { }
										grass_mountains = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										grass_highlands = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										desert_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
										desert_hills = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
										desert_mountains = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
										desert_highlands = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										jungle_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 2
											}
										}
										jungle_hills = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 2
											}
										}
										floodplains = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 2.75
											}
										}
										taiga = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1.5
											}
										}
										marsh = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 2
											}
										}
										alpine_tundra = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										tundra = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										small_island = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				random_list = { 
					1 = { 
						FROM = { 
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									continent = north_america
								}
								if = { 
									limit = { 
										has_global_flag = not_namerica_smallpox
										superregion = east_america_superregion
									}
									every_neighbor_province = { 
										limit = { 
											NOT = { 
												check_variable = { 
													which = kzx
													value = 0.1
												}
												check_variable = { 
													which = kzw
													value = 0.1
												}
											}
											owner = { 
												OR = { 
													technology_group = Andes
													technology_group = mesoamerican
													technology_group = south_american
													technology_group = high_american
												}
											}
										}
										province_event = { 
											id = Plague_Spawner.221
											days = 2555
											random = 365
										}
									}
								}
								else_if = { 
									limit = { 
										has_global_flag = not_camerica_smallpox
										superregion = central_america_superregion
									}
									every_neighbor_province = { 
										limit = { 
											NOT = { 
												check_variable = { 
													which = kzx
													value = 0.1
												}
												check_variable = { 
													which = kzw
													value = 0.1
												}
											}
											owner = { 
												OR = { 
													technology_group = Andes
													technology_group = mesoamerican
													technology_group = south_american
													technology_group = high_american
												}
											}
										}
										province_event = { 
											id = Plague_Spawner.222
											days = 2555
											random = 365
										}
									}
								}
							}
							else_if = { 
								limit = { 
									continent = south_america
									has_global_flag = not_samerica_smallpox
								}
								every_neighbor_province = { 
									limit = { 
										NOT = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = kzx
												value = 0.1
											}
											check_variable = { 
												which = kzw
												value = 0.1
											}
										}
										owner = { 
											OR = { 
												technology_group = Andes
												technology_group = mesoamerican
												technology_group = south_american
												technology_group = high_american
											}
										}
									}
									province_event = { 
										id = Plague_Spawner.2
										days = 2555
										random = 365
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					2 = { }
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_empty = no
					}
					owner = { 
						add_opinion = { 
							who = ROOT
							modifier = MEC_Expeditions_taken_province
						}
					}
				}
				cede_province = ROOT
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					add_colonysize = 1000
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.expedition_success
		add_prestige = 3
	}

country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.321
	title = MEC_Expeditions.321.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.321.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			expedition_provs.australia_vision = { 
				discover_country = ROOT
			}
			FROM = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					add_claim = owner
				}
				add_territorial_core = ROOT
				save_event_target_as = expedition_province
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_empty = yes
						has_province_flag = ColonyBecomesOwner
					}
					change_religion = ROOT
					change_culture = ROOT
					ROOT = { 
						capital_scope = { 
							FROM = { 
								set_variable = { 
									which = kzk
									which = PREV
								}
							}
							FROM = { 
								set_variable = { 
									which = kzw
									which = PREV
								}
							}
							FROM = { 
								set_variable = { 
									which = law
									which = PREV
								}
							}
							FROM = { 
								divide_variable = { 
									which = kzk
									value = 3
								}
							}
							FROM = { 
								divide_variable = { 
									which = kzw
									value = 3
								}
							}
							FROM = { 
								divide_variable = { 
									which = law
									value = 3
								}
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								any_owned_province = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = lax
										value = 0.1
									}
								}
							}
							FROM = { 
								if = { 
									limit = { 
										has_province_flag = possible_malaria
									}
									clr_province_flag = possible_malaria
									set_variable = { 
										which = lax
										value = 0
									}
									if = { 
										limit = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = nla
												value = 15.5
											}
										}
										if = { 
											limit = { 
												check_variable = { 
													which = nla
													value = 17.5
												}
											}
											if = { 
												limit = { 
													check_variable = { 
														which = nla
														value = 19.5
													}
												}
												if = { 
													limit = { 
														check_variable = { 
															which = nla
															value = 21.5
														}
													}
													if = { 
														limit = { 
															check_variable = { 
																which = nla
																value = 23.5
															}
														}
														change_variable = { 
															which = lax
															value = 7
														}
													}
													else = { 
														change_variable = { 
															which = lax
															value = 5
														}
													}
												}
												else = { 
													change_variable = { 
														which = lax
														value = 4
													}
												}
											}
											else = { 
												change_variable = { 
													which = lax
													value = 3
												}
											}
										}
										else = { 
											change_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1
											}
										}
									}
									if = { 
										limit = { 
											has_terrain = marsh
											check_variable = {

												value = 13
											}
										}

											}
										}
										grass_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1.5
											}
										}
										grass_hills = { }
										grass_mountains = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										grass_highlands = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										desert_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
										desert_hills = { 
											multiply_variable = {

											}

										}
										jungle_hills = {

											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1
											}
										}
									}
								}
								every_neighbor_province = { 
									limit = { 
										has_province_flag = possible_malaria
									}
									clr_province_flag = possible_malaria
									set_variable = { 
										which = lax
										value = 0
									}
									if = { 
										limit = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = nla
												value = 15.5
											}
										}
										if = { 
											limit = { 
												check_variable = { 
													which = nla
													value = 17.5
												}
											}
											if = { 
												limit = { 
													check_variable = { 
														which = nla
														value = 19.5
													}
												}
												if = { 
													limit = { 
														check_variable = { 
															which = nla
															value = 21.5
														}
													}
													if = { 
														limit = { 
															check_variable = { 
																which = nla
																value = 23.5
															}
														}
														change_variable = { 
															which = lax
															value = 7
														}
													}
													else = { 
														change_variable = { 
															which = lax
															value = 5
														}
													}
												}
												else = { 
													change_variable = { 
														which = lax
														value = 4
													}
												}
											}
											else = { 
												change_variable = { 
													which = lax
													value = 3
												}
											}
										}
										else = { 
											change_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1
											}
										}
									}
									if = { 
										limit = { 
											has_terrain = marsh
											check_variable = { 
												which = nla
												value = 13
											}
										}
										change_variable = { 
											which = lax
											value = 2
										}
									}
									trigger_switch = { 
										on_trigger = has_terrain
										arctic = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0

								}

						}
					}
				}
				random_list = { 
					1 = { 
						FROM = { 
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									continent = north_america
								}
								if = { 
									limit = { 
										has_global_flag = not_namerica_smallpox
										superregion = east_america_superregion
									}
									every_neighbor_province = { 
										limit = { 
											NOT = { 
												check_variable = { 
													which = kzx
													value = 0.1
												}
												check_variable = { 
													which = kzw
													value = 0.1
												}
											}
											owner = { 
												OR = { 
													technology_group = Andes
													technology_group = mesoamerican
													technology_group = south_american
													technology_group = high_american
												}
											}
										}
										province_event = { 
											id = Plague_Spawner.221
											days = 2555
											random = 365
										}
									}
								}
								else_if = { 
									limit = { 
										has_global_flag = not_camerica_smallpox
										superregion = central_america_superregion
									}
									every_neighbor_province = { 
										limit = { 
											NOT = { 
												check_variable = { 
													which = kzx
													value = 0.1
												}
												check_variable = { 
													which = kzw
													value = 0.1
												}
											}
											owner = { 
												OR = { 
													technology_group = Andes
													technology_group = mesoamerican
													technology_group = south_american
													technology_group = high_american
												}
											}
										}
										province_event = { 
											id = Plague_Spawner.222
											days = 2555
											random = 365
										}
									}
								}
							}
							else_if = { 
								limit = { 
									continent = south_america
									has_global_flag = not_samerica_smallpox
								}
								every_neighbor_province = { 
									limit = { 
										NOT = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = kzx
												value = 0.1
											}
											check_variable = { 
												which = kzw
												value = 0.1
											}
										}
										owner = { 
											OR = { 
												technology_group = Andes
												technology_group = mesoamerican
												technology_group = south_american
												technology_group = high_american
											}
										}
									}
									province_event = { 
										id = Plague_Spawner.2
										days = 2555
										random = 365
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					2 = { }
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_empty = no
					}
					owner = { 
						add_opinion = { 
							who = ROOT
							modifier = MEC_Expeditions_taken_province
						}
					}
				}
				cede_province = ROOT
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					add_colonysize = 1000
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.expedition_success
		add_prestige = 3
	}
}

	id = MEC_Expeditions.322

	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			expedition_provs.pacific_islands_vision = { 
				discover_country = ROOT
			}
			FROM = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					add_claim = owner
				}
				add_territorial_core = ROOT
				save_event_target_as = expedition_province
				if = { 
					limit = {

					change_culture = ROOT

						capital_scope = {

									limit = { 
										has_province_flag = possible_malaria
									}
									clr_province_flag = possible_malaria
									set_variable = { 
										which = lax
										value = 0
									}
									if = { 
										limit = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = nla
												value = 15.5
											}
										}
										if = { 
											limit = { 
												check_variable = { 
													which = nla
													value = 17.5
												}
											}
											if = { 
												limit = { 
													check_variable = { 
														which = nla
														value = 19.5
													}
												}
												if = { 
													limit = { 
														check_variable = { 
															which = nla
															value = 21.5
														}
													}
													if = { 
														limit = { 
															check_variable = { 
																which = nla
																value = 23.5
															}
														}
														change_variable = { 
															which = lax
															value = 7
														}
													}
													else = { 
														change_variable = { 
															which = lax
															value = 5
														}
													}
												}
												else = { 
													change_variable = { 
														which = lax
														value = 4
													}
												}
											}
											else = { 
												change_variable = { 
													which = lax
													value = 3
												}
											}
										}
										else = { 
											change_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1
											}
										}
									}
									if = { 
										limit = { 
											has_terrain = marsh
											check_variable = { 
												which = nla
												value = 13
											}
										}
										change_variable = { 
											which = lax
											value = 2
										}
									}
									trigger_switch = { 
										on_trigger = has_terrain
										arctic = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										forest_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1.2
											}
										}
										forest_hills = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.75
											}
										}
										forest_mountains = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
										forest_highlands = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										wood_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1.5
											}
										}
										wood_hills = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.75
											}
										}
										wood_mountains = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.25
											}
										}
										wood_highlands = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.75
											}
										}
										shrub_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1
											}
										}
										shrub_hills = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.75
											}
										}
										shrub_mountains = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
										shrub_highlands = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
										grass_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1.5
											}
										}
										grass_hills = { }
										grass_mountains = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										grass_highlands = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										desert_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
										desert_hills = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
										desert_mountains = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0.5
											}
										}
										desert_highlands = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										jungle_flats = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 2
											}
										}
										jungle_hills = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 2
											}
										}
										floodplains = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 2.75
											}
										}
										taiga = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1.5
											}
										}
										marsh = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 2
											}
										}
										alpine_tundra = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										tundra = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										small_island = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				random_list = { 
					1 = { 
						FROM = { 
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									continent = north_america
								}
								if = { 
									limit = { 
										has_global_flag = not_namerica_smallpox
										superregion = east_america_superregion
									}
									every_neighbor_province = { 
										limit = { 
											NOT = { 
												check_variable = { 
													which = kzx
													value = 0.1
												}
												check_variable = { 
													which = kzw
													value = 0.1
												}
											}
											owner = { 
												OR = { 
													technology_group = Andes
													technology_group = mesoamerican
													technology_group = south_american
													technology_group = high_american
												}
											}
										}
										province_event = { 
											id = Plague_Spawner.221
											days = 2555
											random = 365
										}
									}
								}
								else_if = { 
									limit = { 
										has_global_flag = not_camerica_smallpox
										superregion = central_america_superregion
									}
									every_neighbor_province = { 
										limit = { 
											NOT = { 
												check_variable = { 
													which = kzx
													value = 0.1
												}
												check_variable = { 
													which = kzw
													value = 0.1
												}
											}
											owner = { 
												OR = { 
													technology_group = Andes
													technology_group = mesoamerican
													technology_group = south_american
													technology_group = high_american
												}
											}
										}
										province_event = { 
											id = Plague_Spawner.222
											days = 2555
											random = 365
										}
									}
								}
							}
							else_if = { 
								limit = { 
									continent = south_america
									has_global_flag = not_samerica_smallpox
								}
								every_neighbor_province = { 
									limit = { 
										NOT = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = kzx
												value = 0.1
											}
											check_variable = { 
												which = kzw
												value = 0.1
											}
										}
										owner = { 
											OR = { 
												technology_group = Andes
												technology_group = mesoamerican
												technology_group = south_american
												technology_group = high_american
											}
										}
									}
									province_event = { 
										id = Plague_Spawner.2
										days = 2555
										random = 365
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					2 = { }
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_empty = no
					}
					owner = { 
						add_opinion = { 
							who = ROOT
							modifier = MEC_Expeditions_taken_province
						}
					}
				}
				cede_province = ROOT
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					add_colonysize = 1000
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.expedition_success
		add_prestige = 3
	}
}

	id = MEC_Expeditions.323

	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			expedition_provs.southern_china_vision = { 
				discover_country = ROOT
			}
			FROM = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					add_claim = owner
				}
				add_territorial_core = ROOT
				save_event_target_as = expedition_province
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_empty = yes
						has_province_flag = ColonyBecomesOwner
					}
					change_religion = ROOT
					change_culture = ROOT
					ROOT = { 
						capital_scope = { 
							FROM = { 
								set_variable = { 
									which = kzk
									which = PREV
								}
							}

									which = kzw

												value = 2.75
											}
										}
										taiga = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1.5
											}
										}
										marsh = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 2
											}
										}
										alpine_tundra = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										tundra = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 0
											}
										}
										small_island = { 
											multiply_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1
											}
										}
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
				}
				random_list = { 
					1 = { 
						FROM = { 
							if = { 
								limit = { 
									continent = north_america
								}
								if = { 
									limit = { 
										has_global_flag = not_namerica_smallpox
										superregion = east_america_superregion
									}
									every_neighbor_province = { 
										limit = { 
											NOT = { 
												check_variable = { 
													which = kzx
													value = 0.1
												}
												check_variable = { 
													which = kzw
													value = 0.1
												}
											}
											owner = { 
												OR = { 
													technology_group = Andes
													technology_group = mesoamerican
													technology_group = south_american
													technology_group = high_american
												}
											}
										}
										province_event = { 
											id = Plague_Spawner.221
											days = 2555
											random = 365
										}
									}
								}
								else_if = { 
									limit = { 
										has_global_flag = not_camerica_smallpox
										superregion = central_america_superregion
									}
									every_neighbor_province = { 
										limit = { 
											NOT = { 
												check_variable = { 
													which = kzx
													value = 0.1
												}
												check_variable = { 
													which = kzw
													value = 0.1
												}
											}
											owner = { 
												OR = { 
													technology_group = Andes
													technology_group = mesoamerican
													technology_group = south_american
													technology_group = high_american
												}
											}
										}
										province_event = { 
											id = Plague_Spawner.222
											days = 2555
											random = 365
										}
									}
								}
							}
							else_if = { 
								limit = { 
									continent = south_america
									has_global_flag = not_samerica_smallpox
								}
								every_neighbor_province = { 
									limit = { 
										NOT = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = kzx
												value = 0.1
											}
											check_variable = { 
												which = kzw
												value = 0.1
											}
										}
										owner = { 
											OR = { 
												technology_group = Andes
												technology_group = mesoamerican
												technology_group = south_american
												technology_group = high_american
											}
										}
									}
									province_event = { 
										id = Plague_Spawner.2
										days = 2555
										random = 365
									}
								}
							}
						}
					}
					2 = { }
				}
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_empty = no
					}
					owner = { 
						add_opinion = { 
							who = ROOT
							modifier = MEC_Expeditions_taken_province
						}
					}
				}
				cede_province = ROOT
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					add_colonysize = 1000
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.expedition_success
		add_prestige = 3
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.324
	title = MEC_Expeditions.324.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.324.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			expedition_provs.northern_china_vision = { 
				discover_country = ROOT
			}
			FROM = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_colony = yes
					}
					add_claim = owner
				}
				add_territorial_core = ROOT
				save_event_target_as = expedition_province
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_empty = yes
						has_province_flag = ColonyBecomesOwner
					}
					change_religion = ROOT
					change_culture = ROOT
					ROOT = { 
						capital_scope = { 
							FROM = { 
								set_variable = { 
									which = kzk
									which = PREV
								}
							}
							FROM = { 
								set_variable = { 
									which = kzw
									which = PREV
								}
							}
							FROM = { 
								set_variable = { 
									which = law
									which = PREV
								}
							}
							FROM = { 
								divide_variable = { 
									which = kzk
									value = 3
								}
							}
							FROM = { 
								divide_variable = { 
									which = kzw
									value = 3
								}
							}
							FROM = { 
								divide_variable = { 
									which = law
									value = 3
								}
							}
						}
						if = { 
							limit = { 
								any_owned_province = { 
									check_variable = { 
										which = lax
										value = 0.1
									}
								}
							}
							FROM = { 
								if = { 
									limit = { 
										has_province_flag = possible_malaria
									}
									clr_province_flag = possible_malaria
									set_variable = { 
										which = lax
										value = 0
									}
									if = { 
										limit = { 
											check_variable = { 
												which = nla
												value = 15.5
											}
										}
										if = { 
											limit = { 
												check_variable = { 
													which = nla
													value = 17.5
												}
											}
											if = { 
												limit = { 
													check_variable = { 
														which = nla
														value = 19.5
													}
												}
												if = { 
													limit = { 
														check_variable = { 
															which = nla
															value = 21.5
														}
													}
													if = { 
														limit = { 
															check_variable = { 
																which = nla
																value = 23.5
															}
														}
														change_variable = { 
															which = lax
															value = 7
														}
													}
													else = { 
														change_variable = { 
															which = lax
															value = 5
														}
													}
												}
												else = { 
													change_variable = { 
														which = lax
														value = 4
													}
												}
											}
											else = { 
												change_variable = { 
													which = lax
													value = 3
												}
											}
										}
										else = { 
											change_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1
											}
										}
									}
									if = { 
										limit = { 
											has_terrain = marsh
											check_variable = { 
												which = nla
												value = 13
											}
										}

										}

											}

												which = lax

											}

															value = 21.5
														}

														limit = { 
															check_variable = { 
																which = nla
																value = 23.5
															}
														}
														change_variable = { 
															which = lax
															value = 7
														}
													}
													else = { 
														change_variable = { 
															which = lax
															value = 5
														}
													}
												}
												else = { 
													change_variable = { 
														which = lax
														value = 4
													}
												}
											}
											else = { 
												change_variable = { 
													which = lax
													value = 3
												}
											}
										}
										else = { 
											change_variable = { 
												which = lax
												value = 1
											}
										}
