	title = MEC_Expeditions.625.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.625.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.trade_failure
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
		}
		add_treasury = 20
		hidden_effect = { 
			expedition_provs.korea_vision = { 
				discover_country = ROOT
			}
		}
	}
}

country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.800
	title = MEC_Expeditions.800.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.800.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			expedition_provs.british_isles = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_empty = yes
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -5
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -3
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -1
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -3
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -2
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
				}
				else = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = mil_tech
						who = owner
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = export
					}
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = trigger_value:fort_level
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						which = export
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arh
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_colony = yes
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = -5
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ari
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = ary
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = brv
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = brw
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = bry
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 7
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 1
						}
					}
					else = { 
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arj
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 700
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 400
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 100
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arh
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = ari
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arj
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.more_info
		highlight = yes
		set_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_decision_event_800
		country_event = { 
			id = MEC_Expeditions.848
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.report
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.801
	title = MEC_Expeditions.801.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.801.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			expedition_provs.northern_europe = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_empty = yes
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -5
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -3
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -1
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -3
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -2
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
				}
				else = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = mil_tech
						who = owner
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = export
					}
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = trigger_value:fort_level
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						which = export
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arh
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_colony = yes
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = -5
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ari
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = ary
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = brv
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = brw
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = bry
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 7
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 1
						}
					}
					else = { 
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arj
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 700
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 400
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 100
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arh
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = ari
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arj
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.more_info
		highlight = yes
		set_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_decision_event_801
		country_event = { 
			id = MEC_Expeditions.848
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.report
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.802
	title = MEC_Expeditions.802.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.802.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			expedition_provs.france = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_empty = yes
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -5
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -3
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -1
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -3
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -2
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
				}
				else = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = mil_tech
						who = owner
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = export
					}
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = trigger_value:fort_level
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						which = export
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arh
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_colony = yes
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = -5
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ari
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = ary
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = brv
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = brw
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = bry
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 7
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 1
						}
					}
					else = { 
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arj
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 700
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 400
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 100
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arh
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = ari
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arj
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.more_info
		highlight = yes
		set_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_decision_event_802
		country_event = { 
			id = MEC_Expeditions.848
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.report
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.803
	title = MEC_Expeditions.803.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.803.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			expedition_provs.iberia = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_empty = yes
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -5
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -3
						}
					}

						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -1
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -3
						}
					}

						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -2
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
				}
				else = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = mil_tech
						who = owner
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = export
					}
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = trigger_value:fort_level
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						which = export
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arh
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_colony = yes
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = -5
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ari
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = ary
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = brv
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = brw
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = bry
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 7
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 1
						}
					}
					else = { 
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arj
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 700
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 400
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 100
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arh
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = ari
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arj
					}
				}
			}
		}

		highlight = yes

						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 7
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 1
						}
					}
					else = { 
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arj
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 700
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 400
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 100
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arh
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = ari
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arj
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.more_info
		highlight = yes
		set_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_decision_event_805
		country_event = { 
			id = MEC_Expeditions.848
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.report
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.806
	title = MEC_Expeditions.806.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.806.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			expedition_provs.west_africa = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_empty = yes
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -5
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -3
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -1
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -3
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -2
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
				}
				else = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = mil_tech
						who = owner
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = export
					}
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = trigger_value:fort_level
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						which = export
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arh
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_colony = yes
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = -5
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ari
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = ary
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = brv
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = brw
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = bry
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 7
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 1
						}
					}
					else = { 
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arj
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 700
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 400
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 100
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arh
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = ari
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arj
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.more_info
		highlight = yes
		set_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_decision_event_806
		country_event = { 
			id = MEC_Expeditions.848
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.report
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.807
	title = MEC_Expeditions.807.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.807.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			expedition_provs.gulf_of_guinea = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_empty = yes
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -5
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
						}

						}
					}

							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
						}
						change_variable = {

							value = -1
						}
					}
					if = {

						}
						change_variable = {

						}
					}

						}

							which = arg
							value = -2
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
				}
				else = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = mil_tech
						who = owner
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = export
					}
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = trigger_value:fort_level
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						which = export
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arh
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_colony = yes
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = -5
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ari
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = ary
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = brv
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = brw
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = bry
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 7
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 1
						}
					}
					else = {

							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arj
						value = 0
					}
					if = {

								which = abt
								value = 700
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = {

								which = abt
								value = 400
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = {

							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 100
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arh
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = ari
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro

					}

					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 1
						}
					}
					else = { 
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arj
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 700
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 400
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 100
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arh
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = ari
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arj
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.more_info
		highlight = yes
		set_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_decision_event_809
		country_event = { 
			id = MEC_Expeditions.848
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.report
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.810
	title = MEC_Expeditions.810.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.810.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			expedition_provs.east_africa = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_empty = yes
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -5
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -3
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -1
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -3
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -2
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
				}
				else = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = mil_tech
						who = owner
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = export
					}
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = trigger_value:fort_level
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						which = export
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arh
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_colony = yes
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = -5
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ari
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = ary
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = brv
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = brw
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = bry
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 7
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 1
						}
					}
					else = { 
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arj
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 700
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 400
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 100
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arh
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = ari
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arj
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.more_info
		highlight = yes
		set_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_decision_event_810
		country_event = { 
			id = MEC_Expeditions.848
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.report
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.811
	title = MEC_Expeditions.811.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.811.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			expedition_provs.indian_ocean = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_empty = yes
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 0
					}

						limit = {

					}

						which = export

					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						which = export
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}

						which = arh
						value = 0
					}

						}

					}

					}

							}
						}

						}

							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 1
						}
					}
					else = { 
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arj
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 700
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 400
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 100
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arh
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = ari
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arj
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.more_info
		highlight = yes
		set_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_decision_event_813
		country_event = { 
			id = MEC_Expeditions.848
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.report
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.814
	title = MEC_Expeditions.814.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.814.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			expedition_provs.southern_india = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_empty = yes
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -5
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -3
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -1
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -3
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -2
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
				}
				else = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = mil_tech
						who = owner
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = export
					}
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = trigger_value:fort_level
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						which = export
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arh
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_colony = yes
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = -5
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ari
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = ary
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = brv
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = brw
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = bry
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 7
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 1
						}
					}
					else = { 
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arj
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 700
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 400
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 100
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arh
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = ari
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arj
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.more_info
		highlight = yes
		set_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_decision_event_814
		country_event = { 
			id = MEC_Expeditions.848
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.report
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
		}
	}

						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 1
						}
					}
					else = { 
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arj
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 700
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 400
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 100
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arh
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = ari
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arj
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.more_info
		highlight = yes
		set_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_decision_event_817
		country_event = { 
			id = MEC_Expeditions.848
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.report
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.818
	title = MEC_Expeditions.818.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.818.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			expedition_provs.indonesia = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_empty = yes
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -5
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -3
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -1
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -3
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -2
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
				}
				else = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = mil_tech
						who = owner
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = export
					}
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = trigger_value:fort_level
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						which = export
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arh
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_colony = yes
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = -5
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ari
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = ary
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = brv
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = brw
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = bry
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 7
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 1
						}
					}
					else = { 
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arj
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 700
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 400
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 100
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arh
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = ari
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arj
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.more_info
		highlight = yes
		set_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_decision_event_818
		country_event = { 
			id = MEC_Expeditions.848
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.report
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.819
	title = MEC_Expeditions.819.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.819.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			expedition_provs.philippines = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_empty = yes
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf

						}

							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor

							value = -1

					change_variable = {

					}
				}
				else = {

						which = export
						value = mil_tech
						who = owner
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = export
					}
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = trigger_value:fort_level
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						which = export
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arh
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_colony = yes
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = -5
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ari
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = ary
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari

					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = brw
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = bry
					}
					if = {

							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 7
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = {

							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari

						}
					}
					else = {

							which = ari

						}

							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj

						}

								which = abt
								value = 100
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 1
						}

					set_variable = {

					}

						which = aro

					}
					change_variable = {

					change_variable = {

					}
					change_variable = {

							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arj
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 700
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 400
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 100
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arh
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = ari
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arj
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.more_info
		highlight = yes
		set_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_decision_event_821
		country_event = { 
			id = MEC_Expeditions.848
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.report
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.822
	title = MEC_Expeditions.822.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.822.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			expedition_provs.pacific_islands = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_empty = yes
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -5
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -3
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -1
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -3
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -2
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
				}
				else = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = mil_tech
						who = owner
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = export
					}
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = trigger_value:fort_level
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						which = export
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arh
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_colony = yes
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = -5
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ari
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = ary
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = brv
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = brw
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = bry
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 7
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 1
						}
					}
					else = { 
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arj
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 700
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 400
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 100
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arh
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = ari
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arj
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.more_info
		highlight = yes
		set_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_decision_event_822
		country_event = { 
			id = MEC_Expeditions.848
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.report
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
		}
	}
}

	id = MEC_Expeditions.823
	title = MEC_Expeditions.823.title

	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture

	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			expedition_provs.southern_china = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_empty = yes
					}

						value = 0
					}

						value = 0
					}

						which = arf

					}

						which = export
						value = trigger_value:fort_level
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						which = export
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arh
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_colony = yes

							value = -5
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ari
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari

					}
					change_variable = {

					}
					change_variable = {

					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = bry
					}

								which = ari
								value = 7
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari

						}
					}

								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						set_variable = {

						}
					}

								which = ari

							}
						}

							which = ari

						}

							}
						}

						}

								value = 700
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 400
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 100
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arh
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = ari
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arj
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.more_info
		highlight = yes
		set_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_decision_event_825
		country_event = { 
			id = MEC_Expeditions.848
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.report
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.826
	title = MEC_Expeditions.826.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.826.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			expedition_provs.japan = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_empty = yes
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -5
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -3
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -1
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -3
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -2
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
				}
				else = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = mil_tech
						who = owner
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = export
					}
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = trigger_value:fort_level
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						which = export
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arh
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_colony = yes
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = -5
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ari
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = ary
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = brv
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = brw
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = bry
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 7
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 1
						}
					}
					else = { 
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arj
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 700
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 400
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 100
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arh
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = ari
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arj
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.more_info
		highlight = yes
		set_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_decision_event_826
		country_event = { 
			id = MEC_Expeditions.848
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.report
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
		}
	}

						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 400
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 100
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arh
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = ari
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arj
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.more_info
		highlight = yes
		set_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_decision_event_829
		country_event = { 
			id = MEC_Expeditions.848
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.report
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.830
	title = MEC_Expeditions.830.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.830.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			expedition_provs.atlantic_colombia = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_empty = yes
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -5
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -3
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -1
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -3
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -2
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
				}
				else = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = mil_tech
						who = owner
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = export
					}
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = trigger_value:fort_level
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						which = export
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arh
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_colony = yes
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = -5
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ari
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = ary
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = brv
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = brw
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = bry
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 7
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 1
						}
					}
					else = { 
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arj
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 700
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 400
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 100
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arh
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = ari
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arj
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.more_info
		highlight = yes
		set_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_decision_event_830
		country_event = { 
			id = MEC_Expeditions.848
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.report
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
		}
	}
}

					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 100
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arh
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = ari
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arj
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.more_info
		highlight = yes
		set_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_decision_event_833
		country_event = { 
			id = MEC_Expeditions.848
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.report
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.834
	title = MEC_Expeditions.834.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.834.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			expedition_provs.south_brazil = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_empty = yes
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -5
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -3
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -1
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -3
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -2
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
				}
				else = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = mil_tech
						who = owner
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = export
					}
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = trigger_value:fort_level
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						which = export
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arh
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_colony = yes
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = -5
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ari
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = ary
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = brv
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = brw
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = bry
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 7
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 1
						}
					}
					else = { 
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arj
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 700
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 400
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 100
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arh
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = ari
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arj
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.more_info
		highlight = yes
		set_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_decision_event_834
		country_event = { 
			id = MEC_Expeditions.848
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.report
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
		}
	}
}

						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arh
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = ari
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arj
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.more_info
		highlight = yes
		set_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_decision_event_837
		country_event = { 
			id = MEC_Expeditions.848
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.report
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.838
	title = MEC_Expeditions.838.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.838.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			expedition_provs.canada = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_empty = yes
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -5
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -3
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -1
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -3
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -2
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
				}
				else = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = mil_tech
						who = owner
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = export
					}
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = trigger_value:fort_level
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						which = export
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arh
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_colony = yes
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = -5
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ari
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = ary
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = brv
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = brw
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = bry
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 7
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 1
						}
					}
					else = { 
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arj
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 700
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 400
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 100
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arh
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = ari
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arj
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.more_info
		highlight = yes
		set_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_decision_event_838
		country_event = { 
			id = MEC_Expeditions.848
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.report
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
		}
	}
}
