					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arh
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = ari
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arj
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.more_info
		highlight = yes
		set_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_decision_event_841
		country_event = { 
			id = MEC_Expeditions.848
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.report
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.842
	title = MEC_Expeditions.842.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.842.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			expedition_provs.california = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_empty = yes
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -5
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -3
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -1
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -3
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -2
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
				}
				else = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = mil_tech
						who = owner
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = export
					}
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = trigger_value:fort_level
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						which = export
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arh
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_colony = yes
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = -5
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ari
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = ary
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = brv
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = brw
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = bry
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 7
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 1
						}
					}
					else = { 
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arj
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 700
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 400
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 100
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arh
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = ari
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arj
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.more_info
		highlight = yes
		set_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_decision_event_842
		country_event = { 
			id = MEC_Expeditions.848
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.report
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
		}
	}
}

					}

						which = arg
						value = 2

						}

						which = aro
						which = arh
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = ari
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arj
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.more_info
		highlight = yes
		set_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_decision_event_845
		country_event = { 
			id = MEC_Expeditions.848
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.report
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
		}
	}
}
country_event = { 
	id = MEC_Expeditions.846
	title = MEC_Expeditions.846.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.846.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture
	is_triggered_only = yes
	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			expedition_provs.peru = { 
				if = { 
					limit = { 
						is_empty = yes
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						value = 0
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Major
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -5
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Important
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -3
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Harbour_Minor
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arf
							value = -1
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Major
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -3
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Important
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -2
						}
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							has_province_flag = TN_Natural_Minor
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arg
							value = -1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
				}
				else = { 
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = mil_tech
						who = owner
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arf
						which = export
					}
					export_to_variable = { 
						which = export
						value = trigger_value:fort_level
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arg
						which = export
					}
					multiply_variable = { 
						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arh
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							is_colony = yes
						}
						change_variable = { 
							which = arh
							value = -5
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = ari
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = ary
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = brv
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = brw
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = ari
						which = bry
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 7
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 4
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = ari
								value = 2
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 1
						}
					}
					else = { 
						set_variable = { 
							which = ari
							value = 0
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arj
						value = 0
					}
					if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 700
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 4
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 400
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 2
						}
					}
					else_if = { 
						limit = { 
							check_variable = { 
								which = abt
								value = 100
							}
						}
						set_variable = { 
							which = arj
							value = 1
						}
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = aro
						value = 0
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arf
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arg
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arh
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = ari
					}
					change_variable = { 
						which = aro
						which = arj
					}
				}
			}
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.more_info
		highlight = yes
		set_country_flag = MEC_Expeditions_decision_event_846
		country_event = { 
			id = MEC_Expeditions.848
		}
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 0
		}
	}
	option = { 
		name = MEC_Expeditions.report
		ai_chance = { 
			factor = 1
		}
	}
}

	id = MEC_Expeditions.847
	title = MEC_Expeditions.847.title
	desc = MEC_Expeditions.847.desc
	picture = TRADEGOODS_eventPicture

	immediate = { 
		hidden_effect = { 
			expedition_provs.chile = {

						is_empty = yes
					}

						value = 0
					}

						which = export

						which = arg
						value = 2
					}
					set_variable = { 
						which = arh

					}

						limit = { 
							is_colony = yes

						}

					}

						which = ari

					}

					}

						which = ari

					}

						}

							}
						}

							which = ari

						}
					}

								which = ari
								value = 2
							}

							which = ari

						}
